translation.en: Okay. On you go.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: All right, Jason's here on Fyre Cay,
translation.zh: 杰森来到了FYRE岛

translation.en: showing him the newly purchased property.
translation.zh: 带他来看刚买下的地

translation.en: -I like it, man. -Getting set up for the Fyre festival.
translation.zh: -我喜欢-为FYRE音乐节作准备

translation.en: I like your life, man, I like what's goin' on.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的生活我喜欢事情的进展

translation.en: -Are you excited for April? -I'm ready, man.
translation.zh: -期待四月吗？-我准备好了

translation.en: -Do I got my ticket? -You have.
translation.zh: -我能拿到票吗？-可以

translation.en: All right, cool, that's all I need to know.
translation.zh: 那好 我只需要知道这个

translation.en: -Biggest event in a decade, I promise you. -I'll be there.
translation.zh: -近十年最盛大的活动 我保证-我会到场

translation.en: [interviewer] When did you first become aware of Fyre?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道FYRE的？

translation.en: I started seeing people posting kind of the promo video.
translation.zh: 我发现人们在发宣传视频

translation.en: It was this very slick production that promised
translation.zh: 制作精良 声称

translation.en: that it was Pablo Escobar's private island
translation.zh: 在巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔的私人岛屿上

translation.en: and that they were flying in thousands of people on private jets.
translation.zh: 几千人得以乘坐私人飞机参加

translation.en: It was just the coolest party that you'd ever seen advertised.
translation.zh: 看起来简直是有史以来最棒的派对

translation.en: [woman 1] My agency contacted me
translation.zh: 我的经纪公司联系我

translation.en: and was like, "Hey, there's this new festival coming up.
translation.zh: 说：“有一个新的音乐节

translation.en: It's really exclusive."
translation.zh: 非常盛大”

translation.en: [woman 2] The most insane festival
translation.zh: 最疯狂的音乐节

translation.en: the world has ever seen.
translation.zh: 前所未有

translation.en: [woman 1] All these models, like,
translation.zh: 所有的模特

translation.en: in the Bahamas.
translation.zh: 都会去巴哈马

translation.en: Acts like Major Lazer, Disclosure, Tyga...
translation.zh: 艺人还包括拉扎尔少校解密兄弟、泰加...

translation.en: [woman 1] This is the first weekend this has ever happened,
translation.zh: 史无前例 嗨翻周末

translation.en: so, literally, I was excited.
translation.zh: 所以我很兴奋

translation.en: But we didn't know anything.
translation.zh: 但我们什么都不知道

translation.en: [reporter 1] It's become one of the most talked-about dramas on social media.
translation.zh: 它成了社交媒体上最让人津津乐道的戏剧性事件

translation.en: [reporter 2] A glamorous, luxurious Caribbean--
translation.zh: 一个激动人心的奢华加勒比

translation.en: [reporter 3] ...island getaway turned disaster-- [reporter 4] ...quickly spiraling into chaos.
translation.zh: -...海岛假期演变成一场灾难-...迅速陷入了混乱

translation.en: [reporter 2] Now, the event's co-founder is facing up to 20 years in prison.
translation.zh: 如今 活动的联合创办人或将面临最高20年的刑期

translation.en: [woman] Are you sorry? Do you have anything to say for yourself?
translation.zh: 你感到抱歉吗？有任何要辩解的吗？

translation.en: Thank you, guys, I'll arrange a comment later. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我待会儿置评 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Hey, Billy?
translation.zh: 喂 比利？

translation.en: There's a bunch of people who's filing lawsuits
translation.zh: 今天有一堆人在联邦法院

translation.en: against you today in federal court. Did you hear about that?
translation.zh: 向你提出诉讼 你听说了吗？

translation.en: [man 2] It just became much more than anybody ever dreamed it would be.
translation.zh: 事情的演变超乎所有人想象

translation.en: I mean, you know the saying, "Desperate people do desperate things."
translation.zh: 你知道那句老话“绝望之人会孤注一掷”

translation.en: And now I hope Billy doesn't go to prison for it, but I don't know.
translation.zh: 我希望比利不会因此而坐牢但我不知道

translation.en: We are here at the Web Summit...
translation.zh: 我们都出席了网络峰会

translation.en: [Shiyuan] I remember that it was a big deal that Ja and Billy
translation.zh: 我记得杰鲁和比利一起参加了网络峰会

translation.en: were going to the Web Summit to talk about Fyre.
translation.zh: 宣传FRYE是一件很轰动的事

translation.en: It was the first real piece of press.
translation.zh: 那是第一次正经的媒体宣传

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna let my partner in crime here, Billy McFarland,
translation.zh: 我会让我的搭档比利麦克法兰德

translation.en: give you all the introduction of what Fyre is.
translation.zh: 向你们好好介绍FYRE

translation.en: [Michael] Billy and Ja met because Billy's previous company, Magnises,
translation.zh: 他们俩因为比利的旧公司麦格尼西斯相识

translation.en: he would have parties and special events and invite the members,
translation.zh: 他会举办派对和特别活动邀请用户参加

translation.en: and one of the events, he tried to book Ja Rule,
translation.zh: 他想邀请杰鲁参加其中一个活动

translation.en: and apparently, that was a very difficult task.
translation.zh: 很显然 这在当时很困难

translation.en: I went to Instagram and found this guy named Reggie Muscles
translation.zh: 我在Instagram上找到了一个叫“肌肉男雷吉”的家伙

translation.en: and he says, "Give me 500 bucks and I'll get you Ja Rule."
translation.zh: 他说：“给我五百美元我就能把杰鲁请过来”

translation.en: I paid Reggie Muscles.
translation.zh: 我付了钱

translation.en: The next day, Reggie Muscles brings in a guy named Gunner.
translation.zh: 第二天 “肌肉男雷吉”介绍了一个叫“炮手”的人

translation.en: Gunner's a little smarter now, so Gunner asked for $1,000 and he said,
translation.zh: “炮手”更聪明 他要一千刀 还说

translation.en: "I'll get you Ja Rule." So, I gave Gunner $1,000.
translation.zh: “我会给你请来杰鲁”所以我又付了钱

translation.en: And Gunner called me a week later saying,
translation.zh: 结果“炮手”一周后打电话给我说

translation.en: "Ja Rule hates your offer."
translation.zh: “杰鲁讨厌你的活动”

translation.en: So one of the problems that we're really tackling is...
translation.zh: 我们想要解决的主要问题之一就是

translation.en: the nasty business of booking.
translation.zh: 聘请艺人的复杂生意

translation.en: [Michael] So, Billy actually pitched me the idea,let me know he was
translation.zh: 所以 比利向我推销了这个想法说他在和杰鲁合作

translation.en: working with Ja Rule and they were recruiting engineers
translation.zh: 所以 比利向我推销了这个想法说他在和杰鲁合作 他们正在招聘工程师搭建这样的一个市场

translation.en: to build this marketplace.
translation.zh: 他们正在招聘工程师搭建这样的一个市场

translation.en: [Shiyuan] You go to the website, you can scroll through various types of talent.
translation.zh: 你去到网站 可以看到各种演艺人员

translation.en: Somebody who wants to have Ja Rule at a birthday party
translation.zh: 要是有人希望聘请杰鲁作为生日派对的嘉宾

translation.en: could, through the app, book Ja Rule for that event
translation.zh: 可以通过手机软件聘请杰鲁

translation.en: and that's sort of the type of thing that you could never do before Fyre.
translation.zh: FYRE出现之前是不可能做到的

translation.en: What these guys did was identify...
translation.zh: 他们这些人找出了...

translation.en: I think, a really beautiful "blindspot" in the industry that...
translation.zh: 在我看来行业里一个美丽的“盲点”

translation.en: The way the trifecta between the three of us worked
translation.zh: 我们三人组成了一个绝佳的团队

translation.en: is that I oversaw product, ran the design development of the app,
translation.zh: 我来负责产品设计 开发手机app

translation.en: Ja was the entertainment industry connection
translation.zh: 杰鲁带来了娱乐圈的人脉

translation.en: and Billy had connections through what he told us was VC funding.
translation.zh: 比利可以帮我们拿到风险投资按照他的说法

translation.en: Every single thing that goes into the booking process
translation.zh: 聘请艺人的整个过程

translation.en: is right then and there...
translation.zh: 都会清晰地展现出来

translation.en: [Samuel] I thought that this was a functioning platform,
translation.zh: 我以为这个平台能上线

translation.en: something that was really going-- That had the opportunity
translation.zh: 有机会一举成名

translation.en: to revolutionize the way, you know, the industry worked.
translation.zh: 改变行业的运作方式

translation.en: The Fyre app had the potential to be a billion-dollar platform.
translation.zh: FYRE的手机app有机会成为价值数十亿美元的平台

translation.en: After working on the app for three to five months,
translation.zh: 开始设计手机软件五个月后

translation.en: we were starting to figure out ways to promote it
translation.zh: 我们开始想宣传方法

translation.en: and in a meeting, I had actually mentioned,
translation.zh: 有一次开会时 我提到

translation.en: "Why don't we throw a festival, a concert for industry professionals?"
translation.zh: “为什么不邀请业内人士来举办一场音乐节？”

translation.en: That idea, Billy kind of hooked onto and then it morphed
translation.zh: 比利很喜欢这个想法没充分征求我和杰鲁的意见前

translation.en: pretty dramatically outside of any input from me or Ja
translation.zh: 就很快发展了起来

translation.en: into what became the Fyre Festival. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 演变成了FYRE音乐节

translation.en: [Ja] Let me fix you up, man.
translation.zh: 让我帮你好好弄弄

translation.en: Let me fix you up a little bit, a'ight?
translation.zh: 让我帮你整理一下 怎么样？

translation.en: A little sandy. That's a'ight.
translation.zh: 有点沙子 没事

translation.en: We're sandy 'cause we're on our fuckin' island havin' a good time.
translation.zh: 我们身上有沙子因为我们他妈在海岛上玩乐呢

translation.en: A'ight?
translation.zh: 懂吗？

translation.en: [Andy] Originally, when Billy called me, he said,
translation.zh: 最初比利打电话找我说

translation.en: "I've bought an island in the Bahamas
translation.zh: “我在巴哈马群岛买了座岛

translation.en: and we're hosting a music festival down there."
translation.zh: 要在那里举办一场音乐节”

translation.en: And I said, "What island?"
translation.zh: 我问：“哪座岛？”

translation.en: And he said, "Pablo Escobar's island,"
translation.zh: 他说：“巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔的岛”

translation.en: and I said, "Oh, my gosh!"
translation.zh: 我说：“天啊”

translation.en: -A year and a half ago... -Talk to them.
translation.zh: -一年半前...-好好跟他们说

translation.en: ...Ja and I were flying over the Exumas and we saw this unmanned runway.
translation.zh: 杰鲁和我飞过埃克苏马岛时发现了这个没人用的跑道

translation.en: We tried dialing it and no one responded, so we landed there.
translation.zh: 我们试图联系塔台 但无人应答所以我们就降落了

translation.en: Turns out it was Norman's Cay.
translation.zh: 结果发现那是诺曼岛礁

translation.en: [J.R.] When I met Billy, it was like,
translation.zh: 当我初见比利时 觉得

translation.en: "Man, this guy is stinking rich. He's bringing all his friends down here
translation.zh: “这人富得流油 带来了所有朋友

translation.en: and he's paying for everything."
translation.zh: 还为他们买单”

translation.en: Four jet skis, four boats,
translation.zh: 四架摩托艇 四艘船

translation.en: and, you know, all having a wild-out time. You know.
translation.zh: 嗨到不行

translation.en: I think the idea just popped up in his head like,
translation.zh: 我觉得他脑袋里立刻就灵光闪现

translation.en: "Ping! We're gonna throw a festival here."
translation.zh: “叮！我们要在这里办个音乐节”

translation.en: They were going to have celebrities there,
translation.zh: 他们本来要邀请名人

translation.en: it would be this big consumer-facing thing
translation.zh: 搞成一个面向消费者的大型活动

translation.en: and that they were going to do buried treasure.
translation.zh: 他们本来还要藏宝

translation.en: [Billy] A real-life treasure hunt.
translation.zh: （寻宝游戏）

translation.en: Win a piece of land on the island, your own private island,
translation.zh: 奖品是岛屿上的一块地产属于你的私岛

translation.en: right here, with the Fyre Cay team.
translation.zh: 就在这里 FYRE岛团队为你呈现

translation.en: From a pure concept standpoint, it holds water.
translation.zh: 单从概念上来说 这很靠谱

translation.en: An amazing experience in a beautiful location
translation.zh: 绝佳的体验 美丽的地点

translation.en: with beautiful people and great music. You can't ask for more.
translation.zh: 时髦的名流 最棒的音乐 堪称完美

translation.en: [Ja] This is going to be the most incredible fuckin' shit.
translation.zh: 这将会是最赞的活动

translation.en: -The Magic Bird. -The Magic Bird.
translation.zh: -魔法之鸟-魔法之鸟

translation.en: "The Magic Bird" is a phrase that me and Billy coined.
translation.zh: 我和比利创造了“魔法之鸟”这个说法

translation.en: The impact that Magic Johnson and Larry Bird had on the NBA.
translation.zh: 灵感来于魔术师约翰逊和拉里伯德在全美篮球协会打篮球的默契

translation.en: It changed the way people saw and thought about basketball.
translation.zh: 他们俩改变了人们对篮球的认知

translation.en: And me and Billy are going to change the way people look at
translation.zh: 我和比利也将让人们刮目相看

translation.en: a young tech entrepreneur
translation.zh: 一个年轻的高科技企业家

translation.en: and a hip-hop mogul come together and create something incredible.
translation.zh: 和嘻哈音乐大亨联手创造一些了不起的东西

translation.en: Billy was kind of nerdy, but clearly smart,
translation.zh: 比利有点书呆子 但的确很聪明

translation.en: clearly an incredible entrepreneur.
translation.zh: 优秀的企业家

translation.en: [Shiyuan] We interacted a lot.
translation.zh: 我们打过不少交道

translation.en: He seemed very charismatic, very trustworthy.
translation.zh: 他看起来很有魅力 值得信赖

translation.en: I thought that he had a vision.
translation.zh: 我以为他很有远见

translation.en: He was able to maneuver and conduct himself around investors
translation.zh: 他能够自找门路 认识到投资人

translation.en: and then build teams to build his products.
translation.zh: 创立团队做产品

translation.en: We were hired to do all the advertising and marketing for the festival.
translation.zh: 我们被聘请做音乐节的营销工作

translation.en: They were hiring the best of the best in each category.
translation.zh: 他们聘请了各个方面的顶级人才

translation.en: Best talent, best distribution,
translation.zh: 最优秀的人力 最厉害的发布人员

translation.en: best social media company.
translation.zh: 最出色的社交媒体公司

translation.en: Fuckjerry had just launched a new marketing agency
translation.zh: “去你的杰瑞”刚刚成立了全新的营销公司

translation.en: and we were hired by Fyre to basically run all the social media.
translation.zh: 我们被聘请负责打理FYRE所有的社交媒体

translation.en: We've got major news.
translation.zh: 重大消息

translation.en: Ja Rule just called us, basically said he wants us to pitch him
translation.zh: 杰鲁刚刚打来电话让我们为他的新手机app FYRE

translation.en: for his new app, Fyre.
translation.zh: 想出一套营销方案

translation.en: -[Man] This is Fuckjerry? -[Ja] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这里就是“去你的杰瑞”？-没错

translation.en: [James] That was an amazing meeting.
translation.zh: 刚才的会议超赞

translation.en: They just bought an island and they're going to have a party in April
translation.zh: 他们买了座岛准备在四月举办一场派对

translation.en: for 10,000 people.
translation.zh: 邀请一万人来参加

translation.en: It felt like they were basically doing a music festival to draw attention to
translation.zh: 感觉他们举办音乐节的目的像是为了宣传这个更厉害的品牌

translation.en: this bigger brand that would end up being the Uber of booking talent.
translation.zh: 可以邀请艺人的手机app立志成为聘请艺人的优步

translation.en: Who was playing, what the food was gonna be,
translation.zh: 表演嘉宾有谁 提供什么食物

translation.en: all the things that typically sell a music festival wasn't the sales point.
translation.zh: 这些普通音乐节的重头戏都不是卖点

translation.en: This was like selling a dream, selling a vacation, selling a concept.
translation.zh: 这是在卖一个梦想卖一个假期 卖一个概念

translation.en: We knew that there was a place
translation.zh: 我们知道有这么一个场地

translation.en: and we knew that there was an idea of having a music festival
translation.zh: 将会举办一场音乐节

translation.en: and that was pretty much it.
translation.zh: 其他的一无所知

translation.en: I directed the commercial.
translation.zh: 我执导了广告

translation.en: When I saw the call sheet, I was like, "That's crazy!"
translation.zh: 当我看到摄制日程表时我简直难以置信

translation.en: Basically, like, ten of the top supermodels in the world.
translation.zh: 基本上就是全世界最顶尖的十位超模

translation.en: It was the titans of the modeling industry -
translation.zh: 都是模特行业的超级巨星

translation.en: Bella Hadid, Emily Ratajkowski, Hailey Baldwin.
translation.zh: 贝拉哈蒂德 艾蜜莉瑞特考斯基海莉鲍德温

translation.en: Supermodels, I'm talking about supermodels.
translation.zh: 超模 真的全都是顶尖超模

translation.en: I thought it was the best thing ever. "It can't get no bigger than this."
translation.zh: 我认为这是最赞的事了阵容强大 无法超越

translation.en: He's recording us!
translation.zh: 他在录制

translation.en: [Brett] One camera crew is shooting with the models,
translation.zh: 一个摄制组在拍摄模特

translation.en: and they had a dedicated film crew, like,
translation.zh: 还有另一个专业的摄制组

translation.en: shooting the dialogue between Billy and his people.
translation.zh: 拍摄比利和他朋友的对话

translation.en: So, we ran into a little issue today.
translation.zh: 我们今天碰到了点麻烦

translation.en: -Sorry, cut. Talk to me. -Okay.
translation.zh: -抱歉 卡 跟我说说-好吧

translation.en: Start, one more time.
translation.zh: 开始 重来一次

translation.en: -We ran into an issue today. -No. Start again.
translation.zh: -我们今天碰到了点麻烦-不 重来

translation.en: [Brett There was no, "This is the story we want to tell."
translation.zh: 没有人站出来说“我们应该拍出这样的故事”

translation.en: There was just, "Capture everything."
translation.zh: 他们只是把一切都给拍下来了

translation.en: We need genuine shots.
translation.zh: 我们需要真实的镜头

translation.en: We need genuine people interacting, having a good time.
translation.zh: 我们需要真实地捕捉到人们彼此的交流和享受

translation.en: I need a wide yacht shot.
translation.zh: 我需要一个游艇的全景镜头

translation.en: We have to do the cave underwater, we need the boats in a flying-V formation.
translation.zh: 我们还得拍水下洞穴我们需要拍摄小艇组成V型编队前进

translation.en: Could we tell Herbie to have a big, big, big bonfire tomorrow night?
translation.zh: 我们能让赫比明天晚上搞一个超级无敌大的篝火吗？

translation.en: Like a huge bonfire?
translation.zh: 超级无敌大篝火？

translation.en: Grant was a neurotic person.
translation.zh: 格兰特有点神经质

translation.en: He was a-- He's a smart dude.
translation.zh: 他挺聪明的

translation.en: He was just overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 他只是压力太大

translation.en: I'm our chief marketing officer.
translation.zh: 我是营销总监

translation.en: I wouldn't call myself a perfectionist, but everything must be perfect, you know?
translation.zh: 我不是完美主义者但一切必须要追求完美 懂吗？

translation.en: [Brett] I mean, it was like a job of five people.
translation.zh: 他一个人做了五个人的工作

translation.en: And he had no experience in doing music festivals
translation.zh: 而且他从没参与举办过音乐节

translation.en: no experience in doing events. But he did work hard.
translation.zh: 从没参与举办过任何活动但他的确蛮努力的

translation.en: So I know Billy wants to go see the pigs and this is the only way to make it work.
translation.zh: 我知道比利想看猪这是唯一的办法

translation.en: [man on phone] But we can't shoot it, dude.
translation.zh: 但我们没法拍下来

translation.en: Fair-- So I--
translation.zh: 好吧 但我...

translation.en: ...and you know we don't need to shoot it.

translation.en: [Ja] Real talk. Like, we're spending a lot of fucking money.
translation.zh: 说实话 我们花了很多钱

translation.en: If we want to go fucking see the pigs, we go see the pigs.
translation.zh: 如果我们想看猪 就他妈会去看

translation.en: [Grant] 'll find a way to make it work.
translation.zh: 我会想方法的

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 那就这样

translation.en: If we wanna fucking see the pigs. the girls wanna go see the pigs,
translation.zh: 如果我们想看猪 姑娘们也想看猪

translation.en: we go fucking see the pigs.
translation.zh: 我们他妈就去看猪

translation.en: [Brett] It was like, "We're gonna scratch the pigs now
translation.zh: 像是：“没错 我们要挠挠这些猪

translation.en: and we're going to shoot it."

translation.en: I wasn't the only one that was changed out in February, March.
translation.zh: 二三月的时候除了我还有其他人员的交替

translation.en: [Marc] They asked me to fly down to the Bahamas to meet them.
translation.zh: 他们叫我飞去巴哈马群岛见面

translation.en: And I flew down there.
translation.zh: 我飞了过去

translation.en: When I was introduced to them I was super excited
translation.zh: 介绍认识的时候 我特别激动

translation.en: to, you know, to participate in what could be a really special event,
translation.zh: 很激动能参与这个非常特别的活动

translation.en: if it was even half of what they had promised their guests.
translation.zh: 即使能完成一半承诺的话都会很特别

translation.en: [Mark] Flying over the islands from Miami
translation.zh: 从迈阿密飞去巴哈马群岛

translation.en: and you see this water and it was magic.
translation.zh: 看到下面的海洋 充满了魔力

translation.en: I mean, I can't even describe it to you.
translation.zh: 我都无法用语言形容

translation.en: We were contacted perhaps...
translation.zh: 他们大约是在

translation.en: forty-five days out.
translation.zh: 音乐节举办前45天联系我们的

translation.en: We were asked to take a shot at putting together a production for them.
translation.zh: 他们邀请我们尝试帮他们完成整个舞台制作

translation.en: The timeframe was very short,
translation.zh: 时间很赶

translation.en: but there was definitely a chance of putting it all together.
translation.zh: 但的确有可能全部完成

translation.en: Billy talked to us, talked to me and I loved his vision.
translation.zh: 比利和我们谈了 和我谈了我非常喜欢他的设想

translation.en: I loved his ideas, his energy.
translation.zh: 喜欢他的想法和能量

translation.en: We sat down and basically put together a budget for him in a day,
translation.zh: 我们坐下来 用一天的时间给他做了一份预算

translation.en: presented to him the next day.
translation.zh: 第二天给他看

translation.en: "Here are your hard facts, here are your costs associated do this.
translation.zh: “这些是基本事实 这些是相关费用”

translation.en: And they said, "This is fine. We can do this."
translation.zh: 他们说：“没问题 我们可以做到”

translation.en: [interviewer] And so roughly, what was that number?
translation.zh: 所以预算大约是多少？

translation.en: I think it was maybe 38?
translation.zh: 大约3800万

translation.en: -[interviewer] Thirty-eight million? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -3800万美元？-是的

translation.en: Billy came and said, "Can you book the lineup for the festival?"
translation.zh: 比利和我说“你能帮音乐节聘请艺术家吗？”

translation.en: I'm a 22, 23-year-old kid, I've never booked talent for...
translation.zh: 我才22、23岁 从来没聘请过艺术家

translation.en: Forget about for a festival.
translation.zh: 更不要说是为音乐节聘请艺术家了

translation.en: I remember the first artist I got was Major Lazer.
translation.zh: 我记得我聘请到的第一个艺术家是拉扎尔少校

translation.en: I mean, grossly overpaid.
translation.zh: 绝对是多花了很多钱

translation.en: And then Disclosure, Blink-182.
translation.zh: 然后请到了解密兄弟和眨眼182

translation.en: The talent alone was three and a half, four million dollars was spent.
translation.zh: 光是在请艺术家上就花了350万到四百万美元

translation.en: Most of the artists they were working with
translation.zh: 大部分合作的艺术家

translation.en: were expecting a certain level of production,
translation.zh: 都对制作有一定的预期

translation.en: a sufficient lighting package...
translation.zh: 足够的灯光组合

translation.en: a good enough sound system
translation.zh: 足够好的音响系统

translation.en: and, you know, we realized that
translation.zh: 我们意识到

translation.en: they didn't really have any idea of what it meant to book the artists
translation.zh: 他们并没有考虑到聘请这些艺术家

translation.en: that they were booking...
translation.zh: 意味着什么

translation.en: what it meant to put up a show like that.
translation.zh: 组织这样的一次音乐节意味着什么

translation.en: You know? "What did this Billy do before?"
translation.zh: 这个叫比利的人之前是干什么的？

translation.en: "He's the visionary behind Magnises."
translation.zh: “他是麦格尼西斯的创办人”

translation.en: That's what they told me.
translation.zh: 他们是这样告诉我的

translation.en: "The visionary behind Magnises."
translation.zh: “麦格尼西斯的创办人”

translation.en: What the hell is Magnises?
translation.zh: 麦格尼西斯是什么鬼？

translation.en: [Bill] Jessica, you're chasing the story about
translation.zh: 杰西卡 你在追踪的故事是

translation.en: the millennials' version of the black card. What have you got?
translation.zh: 千禧年一代对于黑牌的看法你有什么进展？

translation.en: This is Magnises.
translation.zh: 这是麦格尼西斯

translation.en: It's the newest, coolest credit card.
translation.zh: 是最新、最酷的信用卡

translation.en: [Martin] The original vision was simple.
translation.zh: 最初的设想很简单

translation.en: We were just kids, we'd figured out a way to turn
translation.zh: 我们还是孩子 想找办法

translation.en: boring, plastic cards into
translation.zh: 将无聊的塑料信用卡

translation.en: nice-looking, sleek, stainless steel credit cards.
translation.zh: 变成光滑、漂亮的不锈钢信用卡

translation.en: It was black, the thing was metal.
translation.zh: 是黑色的 金属制作的

translation.en: It would make a big clank when you put it down.
translation.zh: 放下的时候会发出当啷一声

translation.en: The girls were like, "Holy hell, what is that? What do you do?"
translation.zh: 妹子们会说：“老天那是什么？你们做了什么？”

translation.en: [Martin] We gained traction.
translation.zh: 我们越来越受欢迎

translation.en: We start growing across the 1,500-member mark.
translation.zh: 开始成长 用户人数超过了1500大关

translation.en: We then decided to turn it into a real membership club.
translation.zh: 于是决定将其发展成真正的会员俱乐部

translation.en: [Billy] Looking back to when I moved to New York, I was looking for a community.
translation.zh: 想起我刚搬来纽约的时候非常想找到一个社区

translation.en: I wanted perks and guidance and, really,
translation.zh: 我想要特别待遇、想要获得指引

translation.en: I wanted to be told what to do, where to go
translation.zh: 我想要有人告诉我做什么、去哪里

translation.en: where to find great things in my city.
translation.zh: 在城市哪里能找到出色的东西

translation.en: So, we created Magnises.
translation.zh: 所以我们创建了麦格尼西斯

translation.en: Billy really is one of the world's greatest salesmen.
translation.zh: 比利确实是全世界最优秀的销售之一

translation.en: He can convince anyone of pretty much anything.
translation.zh: 他几乎可以说服任何人相信任何东西

translation.en: [anchor] Billy, I'm looking forward to the day when I'll be working for you.
translation.zh: 比利 我很期待为你工作的那一天

translation.en: I've known Billy probably since he was 20 years old
translation.zh: 比利20岁左右时 我就认识了他

translation.en: and Billy is an amazing entrepreneur.
translation.zh: 他是个非常出色的企业家

translation.en: This is a young kid who figured out how to get these millennials
translation.zh: 这是一个想出了如何吸引千禧年一代

translation.en: and lock them in.
translation.zh: 并锁住他们的注意力的人

translation.en: So we take everybody who has a card
translation.zh: 我们将所有持有会员卡的人集合起来

translation.en: and create a lot of networking opportunities.
translation.zh: 创造很多交流、建立人脉的机会

translation.en: And we're partners with local merchants -
translation.zh: 而且我们还和当地的商店合作

translation.en: fashion stores, restaurants, gyms.
translation.zh: 包括时装店、餐厅、健身房

translation.en: They offer deals and discounts,
translation.zh: 提供折扣和优惠

translation.en: and the big thing they had was this clubhouse in West Village.
translation.zh: 更重要的是 还在西村有个会所

translation.en: You could take dates and friends there and that's where they had the events.
translation.zh: 可以邀请约会对象或是朋友去会所他们就在这里搞活动

translation.en: I helped Billy design wine tasting series and lecture series
translation.zh: 我帮助比利筹划了系列品酒会、系列讲座

translation.en: and many different things that brought these kids together
translation.zh: 还有很多不同的活动让这些孩子们聚集起来

translation.en: with a sense of community.
translation.zh: 创造出社区归属感

translation.en: The parties were unbelievable. They had live music, booze and food...
translation.zh: 他们举办的派对非常厉害有现场音乐、酒水和食品

translation.en: I saw Ja Rule a bunch.
translation.zh: 我看到了杰鲁那伙人

translation.en: Ja Rule is taking his talents to a new business.
translation.zh: 杰鲁将自己的天赋倾注到了一个新的生意中

translation.en: The rapper lending his creative mind to an elite credit card for millenials.
translation.zh: 这位说唱歌手将其创意运用在了一个为千禧年一代设计的信用卡上

translation.en: What we're doing with Magnises is growing very fast.
translation.zh: 麦格尼西斯在快速成长

translation.en: [Martin] We built on an app, went digital. We crossed the 10,000-member mark.
translation.zh: 我们做了app 转向线上达到了一万用户大关

translation.en: We were taking in close to $2 million in membership fees.
translation.zh: 会员费收了将近两百万美元

translation.en: As we kept moving with Magnises,
translation.zh: 在发展麦格尼西斯的过程中

translation.en: he wanted to penetrate the New York upper class.
translation.zh: 他想涉足纽约的上层阶级

translation.en: He thought that the Maserati and flying to meetings in private jets
translation.zh: 他认为开玛莎拉蒂坐私人飞机去开会

translation.en: were necessary in his pursuit of changing his external image
translation.zh: 对于改变外部形象是十分必要的

translation.en: and he thought that image would also be a serious driver for the company.
translation.zh: 他觉得这种形象也会成为公司发展的重要动力

translation.en: [Andy] I hosted probably 40 events for Magnises
translation.zh: 我大概帮麦格尼西斯主持了40个活动

translation.en: and a lot of the members enjoyed being a part of that community.
translation.zh: 很多用户都很享受成为这个社区的一员

translation.en: That audience, I think, was the audience that Billy was focused on
translation.zh: 我觉得这批受众也是比利在考虑FYRE时

translation.en: as far as Fyre was concerned as well...
translation.zh: 想要针对的人群

translation.en: but it was a vision that was so big...
translation.zh: 但这个愿景实在是太大了

translation.en: that it was not something that was going to be easy to pull off.
translation.zh: 很难轻松实现

translation.en: Could you imagine trying to host a music festival,
translation.zh: 能想象自己举办音乐节吗？

translation.en: even on Miami Beach or in Boston or LA?
translation.zh: 即使在迈阿密海滩或波士顿或洛杉矶

translation.en: Almost impossible without an incredibly big infrastructure.
translation.zh: 没有非常大的基建几乎是不可能的

translation.en: So, dial it up to a small island in the Bahamas.
translation.zh: 所以要在巴哈马群岛的一个小岛上搞盛大的音乐节

translation.en: It would probably be the most difficult place you could do it.
translation.zh: 很可能是最难实现的地方

translation.en: Billy called me and he said, "Listen,
translation.zh: 比利给我打电话说：“听着

translation.en: I need your help and I need you to get to the Bahamas as soon as possible."
translation.zh: 我需要你的帮助我需要你尽快来巴哈马群岛”

translation.en: And I flew in, not in any role, except sort of subtly
translation.zh: 所以我就飞过去了没有特定的职务 算是默默地

translation.en: being the new leader and being kind of...
translation.zh: 成为了新的领导人 成了

translation.en: Billy's whisperer.
translation.zh: 传达比利指示的人

translation.en: To do a proper music festival,
translation.zh: 要做一个正经的音乐节

translation.en: I would say you should try to start the...
translation.zh: 我会建议至少提前12个月开始

translation.en: the design and the fundraising, everything at least 12 months out.
translation.zh: 做设计、筹款等等

translation.en: The true core team that came in literally had
translation.zh: 核心团队就只有

translation.en: six to eight weeks to build this thing and put it together.
translation.zh: 六到八周时间建造 完成音乐节准备

translation.en: [interviewer] Were you ever aware that they said they had bought an island?
translation.zh: 你知道他们说自己买了个岛屿吗？

translation.en: It's like you couldn't...
translation.zh: 就好像你没办法

translation.en: differentiate what was true
translation.zh: 区分什么是真

translation.en: and what wasn't true.
translation.zh: 什么是假

translation.en: I think we chose the right island.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们选了合适的岛

translation.en: We got ours for ten million.
translation.zh: 我们的岛是花一千万买的

translation.en: Freehold land, no lease. We own the land forever.
translation.zh: 永久产权

translation.en: I think it was like, he had to put a million down
translation.zh: 我觉得好像是首付一百万

translation.en: and then pay the rest by a certain amount of time.
translation.zh: 剩下的要在一段时间之内付清

translation.en: I don't know if that million was ever paid.
translation.zh: 我不知道那一百万他到底给没给

translation.en: This was Pablo Escobar's island twenty-five years ago.
translation.zh: 25年前 这是巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔的岛

translation.en: So we're taking the dream for your average person in America
translation.zh: 所以我们帮助普通美国人

translation.en: or wherever they are and saying, "For three days,
translation.zh: 或者其他国家的人圆梦告诉他们 这三天里

translation.en: you can become Pablo Escobar."
translation.zh: 你可以做巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔

translation.en: [Andy] Billy was dealing with Pablo Escobar's lawyer,
translation.zh: 比利和巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔的律师打交道

translation.en: he was dealing with family members.
translation.zh: 和家人打交道

translation.en: [J.R.] Norman's Cay is rich in history
translation.zh: 诺曼岛礁的历史悠久

translation.en: with cocaine drug lords running their drugs through the Bahamas.
translation.zh: 可卡因毒品大佬们通过巴哈马群岛运营毒品

translation.en: The owner of the Cay,
translation.zh: 岛礁的岛主

translation.en: he wanted a new reputation for his Cay.
translation.zh: 想要给岛屿营造一个新的名声

translation.en: They were told not to use the word "Pablo Escobar"
translation.zh: 他们被要求不使用巴勃罗埃斯科瓦尔这个名字

translation.en: and then they used that in the first social media tweets.
translation.zh: 然后他们的第一条推特就用了这个名字

translation.en: The new owner saw the first video promotion
translation.zh: 新的岛主看到了第一条视频推广

translation.en: and he kicked us off in one shot.
translation.zh: 一下子就把我们给赶走了

translation.en: Like, no questions asked.
translation.zh: 什么问题都没问

translation.en: They were kicked off.
translation.zh: 就全部赶走了

translation.en: Six or eight weeks out,
translation.zh: 还剩六到八周

translation.en: he had to find a new location on a neighboring Island...
translation.zh: 他不得不在附近的岛屿寻找地方

translation.en: and then start the whole process all over again.
translation.zh: 然后再把整个过程重新来一遍

translation.en: We were constantly trying to move, like, trying to find a new location
translation.zh: 我们一直在移动 想找新的位置

translation.en: and trying to find what fits.
translation.zh: 找一个合适的地方

translation.en: Man, it just started to get hectic.
translation.zh: 然后 天啊 事情就开始变得忙乱了

translation.en: Then I went to another island, until you finally got to Great Exuma,
translation.zh: 我们走访了很多个岛屿最后终于到了大埃克苏马

translation.en: where it was at least the biggest island in the Exumas
translation.zh: 它至少是埃克苏马群岛中最大的

translation.en: so it had, you know...
translation.zh: 所以有…

translation.en: plumbing.
translation.zh: 下水管道系统

translation.en: American rapper, singer and actor Ja Rule, also known as Jeffrey Atkins,
translation.zh: 美国说唱歌手、演员杰鲁又名杰弗里阿特金斯

translation.en: is in the Bahamas with his business partners
translation.zh: 在巴哈马群岛和他的商业伙伴

translation.en: to discuss the details of a concert next month.
translation.zh: 讨论下个月的一个音乐会细节

translation.en: Fyre was like the thing of the island. Renting so much, rent-a-cars,
translation.zh: FYRE成了岛上的热点他们租了好多车

translation.en: big jets are flying in.
translation.zh: 大型的飞机都飞过来

translation.en: Everybody was saying, "Hey, that's Fyre, they have lots of money.
translation.zh: 大家都说：“那是FYRE 他们可有钱了

translation.en: They could do anything."
translation.zh: 什么都能做”

translation.en: We hope this is the first of many steps
translation.zh: 我们希望这是让娱乐和价值

translation.en: to bring entertainment and bring value back to the Bahamas.
translation.zh: 回归巴哈马群岛的第一步

translation.en: I was waiting for some shit like this to happen in the Bahamas, to be real.
translation.zh: 我很期待这样的事真正在巴哈马群岛发生

translation.en: You know, we never had that many American artists,
translation.zh: 我们从来没有欢迎过那么多美国艺术家

translation.en: you know, on one stage.
translation.zh: 齐聚一个舞台

translation.en: This was supposed to go on for five years, every year.
translation.zh: 这个本来应该连续五年每年都搞的

translation.en: So, if you do good, you were asked for five years.
translation.zh: 如果你做得好 被邀请做五年

translation.en: You got the contract, so you wanted to live up to the expectations.
translation.zh: 拿到了合同 就想达到预期

translation.en: [Mark] They had the site.
translation.zh: 他们有了场地

translation.en: They let us onto the property...
translation.zh: 他们让我们进去

translation.en: and we looked at it.
translation.zh: 我们看了一下

translation.en: And that's when some of the questions started to rise.
translation.zh: 这时候就开始出现疑问了

translation.en: The site...
translation.zh: 场地

translation.en: was on a hill...
translation.zh: 在一座山上

translation.en: and at the base,
translation.zh: 在山脚下

translation.en: what I saw was, pretty much, a housing development
translation.zh: 我看到的基本上是一个住房的

translation.en: construction site...
translation.zh: 建筑工地

translation.en: that was hazardous in many ways and that needed a lot of work.
translation.zh: 很多方面都是有危险的需要做很多工作

translation.en: You know there's going to be hiccups, there's gonna be things to be addressed.
translation.zh: 你预计到会有障碍 会需要解决问题

translation.en: It's a first-year festival on an island and you find solutions.
translation.zh: 在岛上举办的第一届音乐节需要想办法解决问题

translation.en: We said, "Here's what you should think about,
translation.zh: 我们说：“这些是你需要考虑的

translation.en: you know, here's what your tenting is,
translation.zh: 你的帐篷安排是这样的

translation.en: you know, the geodesic domes...
translation.zh: 测地线的穹顶

translation.en: Here's what it's going to cost to set up."
translation.zh: 搞这些的花费是这样”

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: away we went.
translation.zh: 我们就开工了

translation.en: What's crazy is they booked the festival
translation.zh: 最疯狂的是他们给音乐节安排的时间

translation.en: during the busiest weekend of the year on Great Exuma.
translation.zh: 是大埃克苏马岛每年最繁忙的周末

translation.en: It's like the Superbowl there.
translation.zh: 是岛上类似超级碗的活动

translation.en: It's called the National Regatta,
translation.zh: 叫做全国帆船赛

translation.en: and the island basically doubles in population size
translation.zh: 这个时候岛上的人口会翻倍

translation.en: and all of the hotels get booked months, maybe a year in advance.
translation.zh: 所有的酒店都会提前几个月甚至一年就被预订

translation.en: Billy had sold a villa package,
translation.zh: 比利卖出了别墅套餐

translation.en: and these people were essentially staying in an Airbnb,
translation.zh: 这些人其实相当于是住在爱彼迎

translation.en: so we had to find houses all across the island for 500 guests.
translation.zh: 我们得在全岛找到足够的房子给五百名客人居住

translation.en: To make it worse, they had oversold
translation.zh: 更糟糕的是 他们超卖了

translation.en: their "Lodge" packages,
translation.zh: 小屋套餐

translation.en: which were these tents on the main site.
translation.zh: 也就是主场地上的帐篷

translation.en: And then the word comes down from the top
translation.zh: 然后上面发话说

translation.en: that all influencers will get housing for free.
translation.zh: 所有的网红都可以免费住宿

translation.en: So I start calling influencers.
translation.zh: 所以我就开始给网红打电话

translation.en: I was the first voice that they had heard
translation.zh: 我是他们发布完广告之后听到的

translation.en: since they posted.
translation.zh: 第一个组织者的声音

translation.en: Each influencer, and there were about 250 influencers,
translation.zh: 一共有大约250个网红 每个人

translation.en: were promised, for a post,
translation.zh: 都被承诺发布一条广告

translation.en: for one post...
translation.zh: 就能住进

translation.en: a one-bedroom, three-person villa on the beach...
translation.zh: 海滩上的能容纳三人的一卧室别墅

translation.en: that didn't exist.
translation.zh: 而这根本不存在

translation.en: I started talking to Billy...
translation.zh: 我开始和比利谈

translation.en: and from the get-go, it was, you know,
translation.zh: 从一开始就是

translation.en: we were all running around, scrambling, every day to find new houses.
translation.zh: 每天都在慌张地努力寻找新的住房

translation.en: "We need help from you guys, start to cut people.
translation.zh: “我们需要你们的帮助 削减一些人

translation.en: These people aren't paying for the experience.
translation.zh: 这些人并没有付钱享受体验

translation.en: Tell them not to come."
translation.zh: 叫他们不要来”

translation.en: And it was a constant battle because what they cared most about
translation.zh: 这是一场持续不断的斗争因为他们最关心的

translation.en: was the influencers.
translation.zh: 就是这些网红

translation.en: So I'm imploring them to cancel paying guests at this point.
translation.zh: 所以我开始请求他们取消一些付钱的顾客订单

translation.en: "They're not gonna have a place to stay." And the response from Billy was,
translation.zh: “他们没地方住了”比利给我的回复是

translation.en: "We're not a problems focus group. We're a solutions-oriented group.
translation.zh: “我们不是问题焦点团队我们是关注解决方案的团队

translation.en: We need to have a positive attitude about this. We need a good attitude."
translation.zh: 我们需要用积极的态度来面对”

translation.en: And he was unflappable but he was also entirely delusional.
translation.zh: 他毫不慌张 但同时也是充满妄想的

translation.en: So it was this constant battle in my mind between,
translation.zh: 所以我内心就一直在斗争

translation.en: "Is this guy a genius or is he a madman?"
translation.zh: 这个人到底是天才还是疯子？

translation.en: Because he just would not take "no" for an answer and he wouldn't take advice.
translation.zh: 因为他不肯接受否定的答案而且也听不进建议

translation.en: [interviewer] Where do you stand now?
translation.zh: 你现在的想法是什么？

translation.en: He's a liar.
translation.zh: 他是个骗子

translation.en: [Calvin] Billy McFarland first got on my radar living here in New York.
translation.zh: 我第一次关注比利麦克法兰德是他住在纽约的时候

translation.en: He was running a company called Magnises.
translation.zh: 他创造了一家公司叫麦格尼西斯

translation.en: I had a number of friends then that did get the Magnises card
translation.zh: 我有几个朋友当时用了麦格尼西斯卡

translation.en: when they started offering
translation.zh: 他们开始提供

translation.en: access to elite tickets at a cost well below the market rate.
translation.zh: 低于市价的精华门票

translation.en: The whole thing didn't make sense to me.
translation.zh: 当时我就觉得不合理

translation.en: People that I've spoken to that were cardholders
translation.zh: 我和一些会员聊过

translation.en: recount having their reservations canceled at the last minute,
translation.zh: 他们回忆说自己的预定在最后一分钟被临时取消

translation.en: so it seemed very hard for people to actually
translation.zh: 所以人们似乎很难

translation.en: access any of the benefits that they were promised
translation.zh: 获得承诺给他们的福利

translation.en: And so, this guy was always out there, just running hustles...
translation.zh: 这个家伙似乎一直在外面骗人

translation.en: that were sort of slick,
translation.zh: 挺圆滑的

translation.en: but then not necessarily, in my mind, something that was by the book.
translation.zh: 但我觉得并不是百分百合法的

translation.en: I vividly remember the Fyre festival video.
translation.zh: 我还清楚记得FYRE音乐节宣传视频

translation.en: This video was everywhere on Facebook
translation.zh: 这个视频在脸书上无处不在

translation.en: and I see a few of the bands that I actually work with
translation.zh: 我看到和我有合作的几个乐队

translation.en: listed as headliners for this festival.
translation.zh: 被列为这个音乐节的头牌参演者

translation.en: So I immediately called the agents and I say,
translation.zh: 我立刻就给他们的经纪人打电话说

translation.en: "Hey, look, this thing doesn't make sense to me,"
translation.zh: “听着 这件事我觉得不靠谱”

translation.en: and they start saying, "It doesn't make sense to us either.
translation.zh: 他们也说：“我们也觉得不靠谱”

translation.en: These guys are promising to pay two X what our market value is."
translation.zh: 这些人承诺会支付两倍市价

translation.en: I say, "Have they sent the money?" and they say, "Funny that you ask,
translation.zh: 我说：“那他们打钱了吗？”他们回答道：“你问得巧了

translation.en: No, they haven't sent the money for it yet."
translation.zh: 他们还没打钱给我们”

translation.en: I say, "Okay. This is interesting."
translation.zh: 我说：“好了 这下有趣了”

translation.en: I take a more active role
translation.zh: 于是我开始更加积极地

translation.en: in investigating everything that was going on with Fyre Festival.
translation.zh: 调查FYRE音乐节的一切

translation.en: What I realized was that they had rented an area north of Sandals Resort
translation.zh: 我发现他们租下了凉鞋度假村的北边区域

translation.en: and then effectively photoshopped out the bottom portion of the map
translation.zh: 然后用图片编辑的方式将地图的下半部分给去掉了

translation.en: to make it look like they were on a deserted island.
translation.zh: 让它看起来像是处在单独的岛屿上

translation.en: I thought, "The world's gotta know what's going on."
translation.zh: 我心想：“全世界都应该了解发生了什么”

translation.en: So I create the now-infamous Twitter account, FyreFraud.
translation.zh: 所以我就创建了现在臭名昭著的推特账号 FYRE诈骗

translation.en: I thought, "Okay, I'm going to put this out there
translation.zh: 我心想：“我要把信息公开

translation.en: and people are going to see this
translation.zh: 人们看到了之后

translation.en: and everyone's going to know it's bogus,"
translation.zh: 就会知道这都是骗子”

translation.en: and nothing happened.
translation.zh: 但是什么都没有发生

translation.en: I got maybe two or three clicks on Twitter and that was it.
translation.zh: 在推特上只有两三个点击量仅此而已

translation.en: So I said, "All right, we gotta hit 'em a little harder."
translation.zh: 所以我说：“我们得加大力度”

translation.en: What we ended up doing was taking a plane down there
translation.zh: 于是我们坐了飞机飞过去

translation.en: and photographing the development and what they were working on.
translation.zh: 拍摄下了他们在进行的工程建设

translation.en: One of the things that really struck me
translation.zh: 一个让我非常震惊的事情是

translation.en: was that they were erecting these dome tents
translation.zh: 他们架起了这些穹顶的帐篷

translation.en: that were pitched as "luxury villas" that I realized
translation.zh: 并将其包装成“奢华别墅” 我发现

translation.en: were leftover hurricane tents from Hurricane Matthew.
translation.zh: 这些是飓风马修中遗留下的救援帐篷

translation.en: That is a far stretch from a luxury villa on a deserted island.
translation.zh: 这和孤立小岛上的奢华别墅可相差甚远

translation.en: I realized very quickly that there was no way
translation.zh: 我很快就意识到这些人

translation.en: that these guys were going to be able to pull this off.
translation.zh: 不可能成功完成的

translation.en: [Mark] We were building a city within a city
translation.zh: 我们在建的是一个城市中的城市

translation.en: in terms of waste disposal,
translation.zh: 在废弃物丢弃方面

translation.en: in terms of restrooms, water.
translation.zh: 厕所、水源方面

translation.en: It was a fucking shit show,
translation.zh: 完全是一团糟

translation.en: but we were doing everything that we could possibly do.
translation.zh: 但我们还是竭尽所能地做了

translation.en: They're frantically building the site.
translation.zh: 他们在疯狂地建设场地

translation.en: You know, 100 day laborers working around the clock, no sleep.
translation.zh: 一百个临时工没日没夜地赶工

translation.en: It was just this mass, big crew of local workers.
translation.zh: 很大一批当地工人

translation.en: Billy paid them off and then he was like, "You know, we need more guys.
translation.zh: 比利收买了他们 然后说“我们需要更多人

translation.en: We need more workers."
translation.zh: 我们需要更多工人”

translation.en: Billy paid them for the next three days and then...
translation.zh: 比利支付了他们三天的工资

translation.en: Billy's like, "Bring more workers. We need more workers."
translation.zh: 比利说：“再多叫点人来我们还要更多人”

translation.en: And then it was starting to get too much for me to handle.
translation.zh: 人太多了 我开始管不过来了

translation.en: They had every living soul on the island of Exuma
translation.zh: 他们雇了每一个能拿得动毛巾的

translation.en: who could lift a towel, working.
translation.zh: 埃克苏马人来工作

translation.en: My gosh, there had to have been, probably at some point, 200 people.
translation.zh: 老天 一度大概有两百人

translation.en: I had to feed all the staff.
translation.zh: 我得喂饱所有员工

translation.en: Basically, that was taking on the whole Fyre operation under my wings.
translation.zh: 基本上承包了整个FYRE的运营

translation.en: I'd gone down to the Bahamas with some friends
translation.zh: 我和几个朋友去了巴哈马群岛

translation.en: and just coincidentally we actually ran into Ja Rule and Billy down there
translation.zh: 恰好撞见了杰鲁和比利

translation.en: and then they offered to take us on a little tour of the site.
translation.zh: 于是他们提出要带我们去参观一下场地

translation.en: It was beautiful, you know, but it's just like a big giant bluff
translation.zh: 很漂亮 但就像一个巨大的幌子

translation.en: overlooking the ocean. There are no buildings, there's no...
translation.zh: 俯瞰海洋 没有建筑物

translation.en: access to electricity or running water or any of that type of stuff.
translation.zh: 没有电 没有水 或任何这类东西

translation.en: We were just kind of like,
translation.zh: 我们就有点

translation.en: concerned, really, there was no infrastructure in place, you know,
translation.zh: 担心 那里没有任何基建

translation.en: but at the same time, they sounded fairly confident
translation.zh: 但同时 他们听起来也很有信心

translation.en: about their ability to get this thing done.
translation.zh: 有能力把项目完成

translation.en: [Samuel] How is it non-negotiable?
translation.zh: 为什么没有协商的余地？

translation.en: When you guys are not the headlining act at a bigger festival,
translation.zh: 你们不是大音乐节的头牌

translation.en: you guys don't get top of billing. I mean, in our contract...
translation.zh: 就不能把你们的名字写在最上面合同里写了…

translation.en: I understand. I mean, it's a font size.
translation.zh: 我明白 只是字体大小的问题

translation.en: You had people working 24 hours a day.
translation.zh: 有人每天工作24小时

translation.en: I had to work basically two days in one because of Fyre Media
translation.zh: 我基本上一天要当两天用因为同时要管FYRE媒体

translation.en: and then Fyre Festival.
translation.zh: 和FYRE音乐节

translation.en: I noticed the people that were involved in going back and forth to the Bahamas,
translation.zh: 我注意到经常来回巴哈马群岛的人

translation.en: in the planning, they were becoming growingly frustrated.
translation.zh: 开始越来越挫败

translation.en: They would come to me and like,
translation.zh: 他们会和我说

translation.en: "What are you working on with the booking platform?
translation.zh: “你做的预订平台怎么样？”

translation.en: I can't wait to get back on this side of the business
translation.zh: 我等不及要回到这个部门工作了

translation.en: because the festival stuff is just becoming chaotic."
translation.zh: 因为音乐节变得太混乱了

translation.en: We just knew very little about what was happening on the festival side,
translation.zh: 我们对于音乐节那边的情况了解得非常少

translation.en: except, you know, the persistent feeling of growing dread.
translation.zh: 只有一种不断增加的恐惧心理

translation.en: Every single day, it got endlessly more tense.
translation.zh: 每天情况都更紧张

translation.en: We would be at standstill sometimes for weeks
translation.zh: 我们有时候会僵持几周时间

translation.en: not being able to get that final sign off or move through on things
translation.zh: 拿不到最后敲定的批准

translation.en: because he was completely, you know, succumbed to the festival needs.
translation.zh: 因为他完全被音乐节的需求占据

translation.en: Spending money at an outrageous cost and speed.
translation.zh: 用可怕的速度和幅度花钱

translation.en: I wasn't sure if it was startup woes, just like "unorganization",
translation.zh: 我不知道是不是初创企业都这样都这么缺乏组织

translation.en: or if it was actually financial trouble, but sometimes payments would be late.
translation.zh: 或者还是有财务问题有时候发工资会延迟

translation.en: Friday afternoon,
translation.zh: 周五下午

translation.en: our favorite topic is, "Did you get paid and was it for the right amount?"
translation.zh: 我们最喜欢聊的话题是“你拿到工资了吗？数目对吗？”

translation.en: and Michael once was like, "Yeah, I got paid, but it was in a bag of cash."
translation.zh: 迈克尔有一次说“我拿到钱了 不过是一袋现金”

translation.en: [Andy] I knew that cash flow was becoming an issue,
translation.zh: 我知道现金流出现了问题

translation.en: but Billy handled all the finances.
translation.zh: 但是所有财务都是比利负责的

translation.en: At that point,
translation.zh: 一度

translation.en: Billy had said, "Listen, we're into this for 25 million bucks.
translation.zh: 比利说：“我们投了2500万进去”

translation.en: I'm like, "Oh, my gosh, Billy, jeepers."
translation.zh: 我说：“老天啊 比利 太可怕了”

translation.en: The word from people that knew Billy was that he was a magician fundraiser
translation.zh: 认识比利的人都说他在筹款方面是个魔术师

translation.en: and he just kept pulling money in, somehow.
translation.zh: 他还是得以不停地投钱进去

translation.en: [Andy] Billy would get on a jet, he'd fly to New York and he'd come back
translation.zh: 比利会坐飞机去纽约 回来的时候

translation.en: and somehow have another three million bucks
translation.zh: 他又会拿到三百万

translation.en: in his pocket to pull off the next level of needs.
translation.zh: 来满足他下一级别的需求

translation.en: [Mick] Carola was one of the many investors.
translation.zh: 卡罗拉是投资人之一

translation.en: She was a big believer in Billy.
translation.zh: 她非常信任比利

translation.en: She was there from his earliest venture, Magnesis, and then Fyre.
translation.zh: 她一开始就投资了比利的项目从麦格尼西斯到FYRE

translation.en: She had always been around, always supporting this kid
translation.zh: 她一直都在支持这个年轻人

translation.en: and always believing in his ability to become the next big entrepreneur.
translation.zh: 相信他有能力成为下一个大企业家

translation.en: We can figure out how to make an extra three, four, five million dollars.
translation.zh: 我们可以想办法再赚三百到五百万

translation.en: Whether it's higher-tier artist passes,
translation.zh: 可以卖更高级别的艺术家通行证

translation.en: food and alcohol passes, VIP party passes,
translation.zh: 食物和酒水通行证 VIP派对通行证

translation.en: the Kendall Jenner yacht party for $10,000 a head for 100 people.
translation.zh: 坎达儿珍娜游艇派对可以卖一百位每位一万美元

translation.en: Billy had a vision, you know, and he was definitely thinking
translation.zh: 比利有这个愿景 他绝对

translation.en: of every little twist that he could come up with
translation.zh: 想到了他能想到的每一个手段

translation.en: to raise the money to make it happen.
translation.zh: 来筹集需要的资金

translation.en: There's two things going for us: one, an audience who has cash,
translation.zh: 我们有两个优势 第一 有钱的客人

translation.en: and us, we have the celebrity, we have the island.
translation.zh: 还有我们 我们有名人、有岛屿

translation.en: There's ways we can monetize both, we're gonna make that happen.
translation.zh: 我们可以在两方面获利能够成功的

translation.en: I overheard a conversation,
translation.zh: 我无意间听到了他们的对话

translation.en: "Let's put up a cabaña for $50,000
translation.zh: “我们做个帐篷小屋 卖五万

translation.en: and see if anyone buys it."
translation.zh: 看有没有人会买”

translation.en: And I remember thinking, "Do you have a cabaña to sell?
translation.zh: 我记得我当时开始想“你有帐篷小屋卖吗？

translation.en: Because I'm feeling concerned that you're not thinking about that
translation.zh: 因为我挺担心的 你连东西都没有

translation.en: before you are putting it live on the site for someone to buy."
translation.zh: 就放到网上去卖了”

translation.en: [Marc] So, this website came out. It was, like, "fyrecay.com."
translation.zh: 出现了这个叫做fyrecay.com的网站

translation.en: And the site's sole purpose was to destroy this festival.
translation.zh: 这个网站的唯一目的就是毁掉这个音乐节

translation.en: It was getting fed direct information and photos
translation.zh: 网站上出现了直接的信息和照片

translation.en: of the site that was totally unfinished.
translation.zh: 展现出场地完全没有完工

translation.en: News that was happening by the day that only
translation.zh: 网站上的新闻是只有非常高层的人

translation.en: pretty senior people in the festival knew what was happening.
translation.zh: 才会在当时知道的事情

translation.en: [Martin] It was almost like WikiLeaks.
translation.zh: （这是他们卖给你的） 感觉就像维基解密一样

translation.en: We were having these confidential meetings and then things from that meeting
translation.zh: 我们会开保密会议 然后会议内容

translation.en: were actually getting out, word for word.
translation.zh: 就会逐字出现在网站上

translation.en: So we knew someone actually in the meeting had been wired up.
translation.zh: 所以我们知道肯定有参会的人戴了窃听设备

translation.en: So we were all called to the war room to have a meeting
translation.zh: 我们都被召集到作战室开会

translation.en: and it was basically a witch hunt meeting.
translation.zh: 这基本上就是个政治迫害会议

translation.en: It was, "If you are the person
translation.zh: “如果你是那个

translation.en: or people that are sending this information to this website,
translation.zh: 给这个网站提供信息的人

translation.en: we will pursue legal action,
translation.zh: 我们会对你采取法律行动

translation.en: you will leave this island, you will not get paid
translation.zh: 你要离开这个岛屿 不会付你工资

translation.en: and we'll come after you."
translation.zh: 我们会回头找你麻烦”

translation.en: The guy that put together Fyrecay was extorting Billy.
translation.zh: 组建Fyrecay网站的人勒索比利

translation.en: Billy wanted him to take the website down.
translation.zh: 比利想把网站搞下来

translation.en: He said he would only do it if the Fyre Festival
translation.zh: 他说撤销网站的唯一办法就是

translation.en: started releasing actual photos of the campsites.
translation.zh: FYRE公布营地的真实照片

translation.en: And I just kept saying to Billy,
translation.zh: 我不停和比利说

translation.en: "We need to get the messaging out now that this is not a luxury music festival.
translation.zh: “我们现在就需要发布消息说这并不是一个奢华音乐节

translation.en: People aren't staying on yachts, at least, most aren't,
translation.zh: 人们不会住在游艇上至少大部分人不会

translation.en: many are not staying in villas
translation.zh: 很多人也不住在别墅里

translation.en: and if you can get that messaging out now, we will be able to manage expectations."
translation.zh: 如果你现在就发布这个消息我们就能管理人们的预期”

translation.en: [Mark] You know? Like here's the reality. Just do it
translation.zh: 事实就是这样 照做吧

translation.en: and people will make their own decisions on it.
translation.zh: 人们会自行做出决定

translation.en: But you have got to be honest.
translation.zh: 你必须要诚实

translation.en: Here's what it is. Here's the tents, you know?
translation.zh: 情况就是这样 这就是我们的帐篷

translation.en: People are going to find out sooner or later, so, like,
translation.zh: 人们早晚都会发现的

translation.en: why are you walking around...
translation.zh: 所以你为什么要想尽办法

translation.en: trying to dodge the inevitable?
translation.zh: 逃避不可避免的事情？

translation.en: [Marc C.] We were gearing up. We were ready to go.
translation.zh: 我们加大马力 准备出发

translation.en: We're, like, going to the gym, having this grand old time.
translation.zh: 去健身房锻炼 过得很愉快

translation.en: We would go on these jogs every morning to get ready for Fyre Festival.
translation.zh: 每天早上都去晨跑准备好参加音乐节

translation.en: Like, powering around town. "We're going on this great vacation.
translation.zh: 开始在城里竞走“我们要去过这个超级棒的假期

translation.en: We're going to have such a blast.
translation.zh: 肯定会超级开心

translation.en: We're going to meet all these people and have this...
translation.zh: 会认识很多人…

translation.en: just truly fantastic experience."
translation.zh: 有一个非常棒的体验”

translation.en: I mean, it was so exciting.
translation.zh: 超级兴奋

translation.en: [Seth] On April 22nd, I get an email.
translation.zh: 4月22日 我收到一封邮件

translation.en: "I noticed you hadn't created your Fyreband account yet.
translation.zh: 我发现你还没有创立FYRE腕带账户

translation.en: It is your wallet for the weekend, so load it appropriately.
translation.zh: 这是你这周末的钱包 所以适当充值

translation.en: The majority of our guests have added $3,000 for the weekend.
translation.zh: 大部分客人已经为周末充值了三千美元

translation.en: But if you want to reserve tables or take part in the add-on experiences,
translation.zh: 但如果你想预定餐桌或参与额外的体验

translation.en: you will want to put on much more."

translation.en: I mean, this was never tested out.

translation.en: for our festival attendees."

translation.en: They didn't have enough tents and 350 people would have nowhere to stay

translation.en: and by the way, houses that we sourced weren't getting paid.

translation.en: so they're hanging 70% of my fee over my head like a carrot.

translation.en: [Andy] Every day, something else would happen.

translation.en: At this point in time,
translation.zh: 这个时候

translation.en: that we had signed up for got taken off the page.

translation.zh: “这些信息要搞垮我们了

translation.en: so that you wouldn't have 3,000 people saying,

translation.en: "Hey, I don't have my flight information. Where do I need to go?"

translation.en: So as me and Billy was riding back towards the site...
translation.zh: 我和比利开车回场地的时候

translation.en: You know, he was like.... Kinda like panicky look, you know?
translation.zh: 他开始有了恐慌的表情

translation.en: So he's like,
translation.zh: 他说

translation.en: "What do you think? You think we can get this done?

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以

translation.zh: 我当时在心里对自己说

translation.en: "You want to lie to him or you just want to speak the truth?"

translation.en: 'Cause sometimes the truth can come pretty,

translation.en: and then sometimes the truth can just come ugly.

translation.en: So, I was like,

translation.en: "Billy, being honest, I think we could do it.

translation.en: "Okay, should we pull the plug or should we keep this thing going?"

translation.en: And every day, Billy would say,

translation.en: Verbatim. It was like...

translation.en: Never in my career did I ever do this, but there I would be, thinking,

translation.en: "Holy shit."
translation.zh: “妈的”

translation.en: "Guys, we're running out of time.

translation.en: We are one day out without enough beds to safely house

translation.en: our staff, our VIP guests and our paid customers.
translation.zh: 提供给职工、VIP顾客和付费的客人们

translation.en: You need to cancel more guests, immediately."
translation.zh: 你们需要取消更多顾客 立刻执行”

translation.en: I was basically like, "I know that you're worried about press blowback,
translation.zh: 我的意思是：“我知道你们担心媒体的抨击

translation.en: but imagine a scenario where 350 people arrive onto a remote island,

translation.en: and realize they've no place to sleep

translation.en: and to make it worse, they have no way to get home,

translation.en: because we don't have any charter flights booked back for them.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有预定送他们回去的飞机

translation.en: I know you're worried about the press, but there's no worse situation than that."
translation.zh: 我知道你们担心媒体但这才是最糟糕的情况”

translation.en: And the response?

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Billy was under such immense financial pressure
translation.zh: 比利的财务压力太大了

translation.en: that he effectively had to put this festival on

translation.en: because otherwise he wasn't going to be able to repay
translation.zh: 否则就无法偿付他筹到款的

translation.en: any of the factor receivables that he had raised money from.

translation.en: It's the same thing as an individual going to a loan shark.

translation.en: No matter what happened, this money was going to be owed.

translation.en: They had told investors who had already given money

translation.en: that, in the event of a cancellation, that they would be covered

translation.en: when in fact they weren't.

translation.en: And they didn't have festival insurance, so canceling really wasn't an option.
translation.zh: 而且他们也没有买音乐节保险所以取消并不是可行的选项

translation.en: [Marc] I mean, this was truly a disaster.

translation.en: And events always feel like a disaster.
translation.zh: 活动总是让人觉得像是场灾难

translation.en: They always feel like everything's going wrong and you're putting out fires.

translation.en: The draw, the appeal was to be part of creating something that was special.

translation.en: And that desire overcame my inner wisdom, which was like, "This is a mess."

translation.en: nobody, no matter what,

translation.en: It's possible that by solving problems,

translation.en: we were just enabling them to continue to create this monster.

translation.en: four containers filled...

translation.en: but I had left the week before for two days

translation.en: to go to meetings in Bermuda for the America's Cup.

translation.zh: 是比利给我打电话

translation.zh: 比利给我电话说：“安迪我们需要你为团队做一个牺牲”

translation.zh: 我说

translation.en: suck...

translation.en: dick...

translation.en: to fix this water problem?"
translation.zh: 来解决水的问题？”

translation.zh: 我说：“比利 什么？”他说：“安迪

translation.en: if you will go down and suck Cunningham's dick,

translation.en: and get him to clear all of the containers with water,

translation.en: you will save this festival."
translation.zh: 你就拯救了这个音乐节”

translation.en: And I literally drove home, took a shower,
translation.zh: 我真的就开车回家 洗了个澡

translation.en: I drank some mouthwash.
translation.zh: 喝了一些漱口水

translation.en: I'm like, "Oh my gosh, I'm really..." And I got into my car
translation.zh: 我心想：“老天 我真的要…”我坐上车开出去

translation.en: to drive across the island to take one for the team...
translation.zh: 驾车跨越了岛屿 准备为团队牺牲

translation.en: but I want to be want to be one of the first people to be paid

translation.en: this import fee for what you're doing," and I said, "Okay, great."
translation.zh: 你们买这些水付的进口费用的人”我说：“好啊”

translation.en: Can you imagine, in my 30 years of a career,

translation.en: that this is what I was going to do?

translation.en: I was going to do that, honestly, to save the festival.
