translation.en: Major news in the vlog today. Tomorrow morning, 5:30,
translation.zh: 今天视频播客的大新闻明天早上5点30分

translation.en: half of the Jerry Media crew is going to Fyre Festival in Bahamas
translation.zh: 杰瑞媒体的一半员工会前往巴哈马群岛的FYRE音乐节

translation.en: on a remote island.
translation.zh: 在一个偏远的小岛上

translation.en: We've been doing their marketing for the last couple of months,
translation.zh: 我们一直在帮他们做市场营销

translation.en: so excited to see this thing take off.
translation.zh: 很激动看到项目即将举办了

translation.en: I think it's going to be f... epic.
translation.zh: 我觉得肯定会超级壮观

translation.en: We went down with about four of the teammates
translation.zh: 在音乐节前一天

translation.en: the day before the festival.
translation.zh: 大约四个团队成员前往了音乐节现场

translation.en: Mick, the good news about this plane? If we want to leave, just...
translation.zh: 这个飞机有什么优点呢？如果我们想下飞机 就只要…

translation.en: take the window off and just head out.
translation.zh: 把窗户拿下来 就能出去了

translation.en: This is great. This is a great flight.
translation.zh: 很棒 这趟飞行很棒

translation.en: I remember the feeling, getting off the plane, we were so excited.
translation.zh: 我记得下飞机时我们非常激动

translation.en: "Finally here, this is happening."
translation.zh: “音乐节终于发生了”

translation.en: There's literally no cars on the island.
translation.zh: 岛上没有一辆车

translation.en: We couldn't rent one. They didn't hook us up with one, so...
translation.zh: 我们没有办法租车他们也没给我们安排车 所以…

translation.en: this is us. We're hitch-hiking for the next couple of days.
translation.zh: 接下来几天我们都打算搭便车了

translation.en: I was down there yesterday
translation.zh: 我昨天刚去过

translation.en: and I said, "Man, this ain't gonna be finished for no Friday."
translation.zh: 我说：“老天 这个周五可完工不了”

translation.en: So much work, so much things!
translation.zh: 太多工作要做了

translation.en: And so little time.
translation.zh: 时间太少了

translation.en: So, none of this was here. All this sand is new.
translation.zh: 这些本来都不存在这些沙子都是新的

translation.en: -This was all put down... -[James] Yeah, I can tell.
translation.zh: -这些都几天前…-我能看得出来

translation.en: ...a few days ago. Can you?
translation.zh: …刚铺的 你能看出来？

translation.en: [Marc] It's all peaking on this last day because it's going to happen.
translation.zh: 最后一天压力是最大的因为音乐节是会举办的

translation.en: We all know now that this is an inevitability,
translation.zh: 我们现在都知道这是一个必然

translation.en: that this event is going to happen, no matter what.
translation.zh: 这个音乐节不论如何都会举办了

translation.en: I'm working with this Navy SEAL
translation.zh: 我和一个海豹突击队员合作

translation.en: who's telling me this is like a clusterfuck.
translation.zh: 他说这一切是一大坨屎

translation.en: That's what he called it. "An elephant of a clusterfuck."
translation.zh: 他就是这么说的“像大象那么大的一坨屎”

translation.en: He's laughing and not even laughing,
translation.zh: 他在笑 甚至笑不出来了

translation.en: just disturbed at how fucked up this is and...
translation.zh: 只是被这事有多么的糟糕而烦恼 然后…

translation.en: and he's a Navy SEAL, like, come on!
translation.zh: 他可是个海豹突击队员啊 拜托！

translation.en: The last 24 hours were unbelievable.
translation.zh: 最后24小时难以置信

translation.en: All I kept thinking about was Woodstock.
translation.zh: 我一直控制不住去想伍德斯托克

translation.en: Think of that music festival.
translation.zh: 想想那个音乐节

translation.en: Does anybody talk about the hundreds and hundreds of cars
translation.zh: 有人还在聊堵在路上好几天的

translation.en: that were stuck on the thruway for days?
translation.zh: 几百辆车吗？

translation.en: Does anybody talk about the mudslides?
translation.zh: 还有人聊泥石流吗？

translation.en: How many people died of drug overdoses? Does anybody talk about the lack of food?
translation.zh: 还有人聊多少人死于毒品吸食过量还有人聊食物多么缺乏吗？

translation.en: Almost no water.
translation.zh: 几乎没有水

translation.en: Absolutely not. And I thought, "You know what?
translation.zh: 没有任何人聊这些我心想：“你知道吗？

translation.en: If Woodstock could get through that and, from a publicity perspective,
translation.zh: 伍德斯托克音乐节出了这么多问题还能从媒体角度上

translation.en: land where it did,
translation.zh: 达到现在这个地位

translation.en: FyreFestival can make it."
translation.zh: FYRE音乐节也可以做到”

translation.en: Well, actually we didn't sleep that night.
translation.zh: 其实那天晚上我们没有睡

translation.en: 'cause I remember exactly what happened, so...
translation.zh: 因为我清楚地记得发生了什么

translation.en: we're standing outside on the porch of this mansion,
translation.zh: 我们站在别墅的门廊外

translation.en: looking out at the ocean and it's a full moon or something
translation.zh: 看着大海 当时是满月

translation.en: and it starts...
translation.zh: 然后突然开始

translation.en: pouring rain.
translation.zh: 下起了大暴雨

translation.en: Pouring rain.
translation.zh: 大暴雨

translation.en: Thunder and lightning.
translation.zh: 电闪雷鸣

translation.en: And we just start laughing.
translation.zh: 我们就开始笑

translation.en: Like, belly laughs...
translation.zh: 捧腹大笑

translation.en: and look at each other and...
translation.zh: 看着对方

translation.en: To this point, I'm so delirious
translation.zh: 这时我神志已经不清楚了

translation.en: that I still am not sure that this is 100% entirely true,
translation.zh: 所以不能百分之百确定我的记忆是准确的

translation.en: but I remember one of our group saying,
translation.zh: 但我记得有个团队成员说

translation.en: "At least they won't get away with it now."
translation.zh: “至少现在他们没办法侥幸成功了”

translation.en: I honestly remember that and I don't know that that's--
translation.zh: 我说实话记得这句话我不知道是不是…

translation.en: But that's what I remember.
translation.zh: 但我记得是这样

translation.en: So you have to realize the site's unfinished.
translation.zh: 你们要意识到的是 场地还没完工

translation.en: There's mattresses all over the place getting soaked.
translation.zh: 地上到处都是床垫 被淋得湿透

translation.en: Any tent that was done is now unlivable.
translation.zh: 所有搭好的帐篷都没办法居住了

translation.en: And the guests are still coming.
translation.zh: 客人们还是会来

translation.en: And we have nowhere to put them.
translation.zh: 我们没有地方给他们住

translation.en: [J.R.] The rainstorm that morning killed us.
translation.zh: 那天早上的暴风雨摧毁了我们

translation.en: Because I know the work we had done that morning and...
translation.zh: 因为我知道我们那天早上做的工作 然后…

translation.en: I could have cried.
translation.zh: 我都要哭出来了

translation.en: I think I did. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我觉得我确实哭了

translation.en: The other funny thing that happened was we were laughing and we were like,
translation.zh: 另一件有趣的事情是我们一边笑一边说

translation.en: "Well at least nothing is on time in the Bahamas.
translation.zh: “至少在巴哈马群岛没有任何东西是准时的

translation.en: At least this rain... The guests will be late."
translation.zh: 因为这场雨 客人们肯定会晚到”

translation.en: They were supposed to come at 6:50, the first flight got there at 6:20.
translation.zh: 他们本应该6点50分抵达结果第一班飞机6点20分就抵达了

translation.en: It was like a sick joke.
translation.zh: 就像个倒胃口的笑话

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 于是…

translation.en: So... [chuckling]
translation.zh: 于是…

translation.en: Fyre Festival, baby. Here we go.
translation.zh: FYRE音乐节 我们来了

translation.en: About to go to...
translation.zh: 即将前往

translation.en: Miami.
translation.zh: 迈阿密

translation.en: Miami for, like, four hours. And then where are we going?
translation.zh: 在迈阿密停留四个小时左右然后我们要去哪里？

translation.en: -Bahamas. -Bahamas.
translation.zh: -巴哈马群岛-巴哈马群岛

translation.en: Check out my ice, baby.
translation.zh: 看我的手表

translation.en: Bahamas. We're coming for you, baby.
translation.zh: 巴哈马群岛 我们来了

translation.en: We are here in the... "private jet."
translation.zh: 我们坐上了“私人飞机”

translation.en: We thought we were going to get on one of those propeller planes,
translation.zh: 我们以为我们会坐那种螺旋桨飞机

translation.en: like a tiny little propeller plane
translation.zh: 就像视频里拍的那种

translation.en: that was in all of the video footage.
translation.zh: 小型的螺旋桨飞机

translation.en: I didn't realize what plane we were going to be on until we were boarded.
translation.zh: 我们直到上飞机才知道要坐的是什么样的飞机

translation.en: And, I mean, it was like a 737.
translation.zh: 像是一架波音737

translation.en: My understanding, it was supposed to be this "branded jet experience,"
translation.zh: 我本来的理解是 飞行会是这种“品牌专属飞机体验”

translation.en: which I think was a...
translation.zh: 实际上我觉得是…

translation.en: I don't know where they got it from. It was just... [laughs]
translation.zh: 我不知道他们是怎么想的 只是…

translation.en: "Oh, let's slap a logo on it and call it a day" type of thing.
translation.zh: “我们就给飞机贴个标签完事”

translation.en: It's actually worse than, like, really...
translation.zh: 这其实比坐

translation.en: Like being low economy class.
translation.zh: 最差的经济舱还要糟糕

translation.en: [Seth] It was about 4:30 when we're getting on the plane,
translation.zh: 我们上飞机的时候大约是4点半

translation.en: and that's when my friend looked at his phone and said,
translation.zh: 然后我的朋友看了一眼手机说

translation.en: "Blink-182 just pulled out.
translation.zh: “眨眼182退出了

translation.en: Do you still want to get on the plane?"
translation.zh: 你还想上飞机吗？”

translation.en: And their reasoning wasn't anything like,
translation.zh: 他们给的原因并不是

translation.en: "Don't go, it's a disaster."
translation.zh: “别去 一场灾难”

translation.en: It was just like, "We don't think we can put on the show
translation.zh: 而是“我们觉得我们无法

translation.en: that our fans would deserve."
translation.zh: 为粉丝提供他们应享有的表演”

translation.en: I've never been to a Blink-182 concert so I don't even know what that means.
translation.zh: 我从来没去听过眨眼182的演唱会所以不知道这意味着什么

translation.en: So we were like, "It will be fine."
translation.zh: 于是我们说：“没问题”

translation.en: [Justin] We all got off and landed on this beautiful island.
translation.zh: 我们都下飞机抵达了这个美丽的岛屿

translation.en: Still, nothing seemed amiss.
translation.zh: 看起来仍然没有任何问题

translation.en: I do remember being presented a choice.
translation.zh: 我记得有两个选项给我们

translation.en: "Do you want to go to the campsite or do you want to go to this restaurant,
translation.zh: “你想去音乐节场地还是想去这个餐厅

translation.en: this beachside restaurant?"
translation.zh: 这个海滩边的餐厅”

translation.en: An executive decision was made, I don't know by who,
translation.zh: 当时做出了一个行政决定我不知道是谁做的决定

translation.en: but it was to essentially close down the campsite
translation.zh: 将音乐节场地关闭

translation.en: and to reroute all of the new attendees
translation.zh: 将所有新抵达的参与者

translation.en: to a separate bar.
translation.zh: 送往一个单独的酒吧

translation.en: It was never planned. I knew of it, like, maybe 25 minutes
translation.zh: 从来不是计划的一部分我大概提前25分钟才知道

translation.en: to them coming down to the restaurant.
translation.zh: 他们要来餐厅了

translation.en: Tons of buses, bussing in hundreds of their guests.
translation.zh: 好多客车 开了几百个客人过来

translation.en: And they were asking, "Is this the Fyre Festival?"
translation.zh: 他们开始问：“这是FYRE音乐节吗？”

translation.en: They all thought that they were at the first step
translation.zh: 他们都以为自己来到了一个非常激动人心的体验的

translation.en: of what was going to be a very exciting experience.
translation.zh: 第一步

translation.en: It's on this, like, beautiful beach.
translation.zh: 餐厅在这个非常漂亮的沙滩上

translation.en: A dock goes all the way out,
translation.zh: 有个一直延伸到海里的码头

translation.en: people are just dangling their legs, having tequila.
translation.zh: 人们晃着脚 喝着龙舌兰

translation.en: I'm looking around and I'm like, "This is the greatest decoy of all time."
translation.zh: 我朝周围看着 心想“这是史上最大的诱饵”

translation.en: The music playing, and the guests was just cheering on.
translation.zh: 音乐响起 客人们开始欢呼

translation.en: They were dancing and having a good time.
translation.zh: 他们开始跳舞 享受美好时光

translation.en: [Mick] There was a lot of smiles and a lot of happiness over at this other bar.
translation.zh: 在另外一个酒吧有很多微笑和快乐

translation.en: Quite frankly, it was probably the best part of the entire experience.
translation.zh: 这可能是整个体验中最好的部分了

translation.en: What was happening on the campgrounds was the exact opposite.
translation.zh: 营地的情况则是恰恰相反

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: They're soaking wet!
translation.zh: 全部湿透了

translation.en: [Mick] The tents are soaked, mud is sliding on the carpets.
translation.zh: 帐篷湿透了 地毯上到处都是泥巴

translation.en: What was already this kind of very loosely put together festival,
translation.zh: 本来就是一个非常松散地组织起来的音乐节

translation.en: which was over-advertised,
translation.zh: 还被过度宣传

translation.en: has now devolved into something much worse.
translation.zh: 现在则变得更加糟糕

translation.en: [Marc] We didn't have enough drivers, we didn't have enough houses,
translation.zh: 司机不够、房屋数量不够

translation.en: we didn't have enough beds, we didn't have enough site,
translation.zh: 床不够、营地不够

translation.en: we didn't have enough staff.
translation.zh: 员工不够

translation.en: It was just... We were overwhelmed.
translation.zh: 完全不堪重负

translation.en: So I'm getting phone calls. I'm trying to charge my phone,
translation.zh: 我想试图给手机充电时接到电话

translation.en: and the calls are to get me to the blue production house.
translation.zh: 叫我去蓝色制作屋

translation.en: So I get there and it's mayhem. People are scrambling everywhere.
translation.zh: 我抵达时一片混乱 人们乱成一团

translation.en: They're still outside trying to build stuff.
translation.zh: 他们还在外面试图继续建造

translation.en: [Marc] Grant was like, "You got the paper bags?"
translation.zh: 格兰特说：“你带了纸袋吗？”

translation.en: Because he's like hyperventilating in the bedroom.
translation.zh: 因为他在卧室里过度呼吸了

translation.en: People are crying and it's all these emotions.
translation.zh: 人们都在哭 都在发泄情绪

translation.en: I was like, "Okay, get your shit done."
translation.zh: 我说：“好了 振作起来”

translation.en: I'm literally getting now physically pulled
translation.zh: 我被不同的助手

translation.en: in different directions by the assistants.
translation.zh: 同时往好几个方向拉扯

translation.en: "Marc, this person arrived, that person arrived.
translation.zh: “马克 这个人到了 那个人到了

translation.en: We need to find them houses."
translation.zh: 我们得给他们找地方住”

translation.en: I thought something was wrong
translation.zh: 他们让我们在沙滩上

translation.en: after they held us on the beach for six hours.
translation.zh: 待了六个小时后 我感觉出问题了

translation.en: Kinda funneling tequila down our throats.
translation.zh: 不停地给我们灌龙舌兰酒

translation.en: They started asking,
translation.zh: 他们开始问

translation.en: "Where can I go? Where do we go?"
translation.zh: “我可以去哪里？我们到哪里去？”

translation.en: "How are we getting to the campsite? Where is the campsite?
translation.zh: “我们要怎么去营地？营地在哪里？

translation.en: Where's my luggage?"
translation.zh: 我的行李呢？”

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.zh: 我心想

translation.en: "What do I tell them?"
translation.zh: “我怎么告诉他们呢？”

translation.en: You know, Billy would be in the room and he'd be kind of the CEO,
translation.zh: 比利一直在房间里 担任CEO的角色

translation.en: calling the shots.
translation.zh: 做决定

translation.en: Every now and then, he would walk out, go get on his four-wheeler,
translation.zh: 他时不时会走出去 开上四驱车

translation.en: and just ride really fast in, like, one direction.
translation.zh: 朝着一个方向快速开走

translation.en: Just take off.
translation.zh: 就开走了

translation.en: And then he would come right back and walk back in without, you know,
translation.zh: 然后他立刻就会回来 又走进来

translation.en: a lot to talk about, but you could see he just had like bottled up energy.
translation.zh: 话不多 但能看出压抑了很多能量

translation.en: It's time to let people in
translation.zh: 现在该让人们进营地了

translation.en: and kind of see how it unfolds.
translation.zh: 看看会发生什么吧

translation.en: [Marc C.] There was no one from Fyre Festival on the bus.
translation.zh: 客车上没有任何FYRE音乐节的员工

translation.en: The bus driver just knew where to go, and he's telling us,
translation.zh: 客车司机知道要往哪里开他告诉我们

translation.en: "Oh, yeah, they didn't start construction on any of this until maybe a month ago."
translation.zh: “他们是一个月前才开始建造的”

translation.en: Or, "Oh, yeah, you're really in for something.
translation.zh: 还说：“没错 你们准备好被吓到吧

translation.en: Just wait until you see what you're getting yourselves into."
translation.zh: 等着看现场的情况吧”

translation.en: Which is a very concerning thing to hear when you're on a bus
translation.zh: 在客车上听到这种事是很令人担心的

translation.en: to you have no idea where
translation.zh: 考虑到你都不知道要去哪里

translation.en: after taking a plane to God knows what island
translation.zh: 之前坐飞机也不知道飞来的是哪个岛

translation.en: with who knows what people.
translation.zh: 也不知道主办者是谁

translation.en: [woman] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Turn around!
translation.zh: 掉头！

translation.en: Turn this bus right around!
translation.zh: 现在就把这辆客车掉头！

translation.en: We see this sea of white little tents.
translation.zh: 我们看到了一大片白色的小帐篷

translation.en: [Seth] There was a disbelief on the bus.
translation.zh: 客车上很多人都不敢相信

translation.en: A lot of people thought, "Maybe we're passing through this area.
translation.zh: 很多人都觉得：“也许我们只是路过

translation.en: Our villas are just on the other side."
translation.zh: 我们的别墅在另一边”

translation.en: And it was the bus driver who said, "Oh, no. That's where you're staying."
translation.zh: 客车司机说“不 这就是你们要住的地方”

translation.en: It was like, "Oh, my God!"
translation.zh: 我心想：“天啊！”

translation.en: -[woman] Look at the beds! -[man] Oh, Jesus!
translation.zh: -看看那些床-老天！

translation.en: This festival is never happening again, I hope they know that.
translation.zh: 这个音乐节绝不可能有第二届了我希望他们知道这一点

translation.en: [Seth] They kinda drive us around the little lagoon
translation.zh: 他开着我们转过了这个小泻湖

translation.en: and we get to that blue house that I guess was their headquarters,
translation.zh: 到了一座蓝色的房子附近我猜那是他们的总部

translation.en: and there was just a line of hundreds of people.
translation.zh: 有几百个人在排队

translation.en: [woman] We have literally been standing here for, like, an hour.
translation.zh: 我们在这里已经站了一个小时了

translation.en: [Seth] We didn't know what we were standing in line for,
translation.zh: 我们都不知道排队干什么

translation.en: but we kept standing there,
translation.zh: 只是一直站在那里

translation.en: and some people just had bottles of liquor.
translation.zh: 有些人拿着大瓶的酒

translation.en: Billy came up to me and told me to just blast the music.
translation.zh: 比利走过来 叫我开大音量放歌

translation.en: As loud as I possibly could.
translation.zh: 音量越大越好

translation.en: That's one of the most annoying parts. You could just hear this pulsating noise.
translation.zh: 最烦人的部分是能听到超级大声的噪音在回响

translation.en: [Luca] And, you know, every five minutes it would be...
translation.zh: 每隔五分钟

translation.en: Like, one of the hostesses or one of the staff that would come,
translation.zh: 就会有房主或者员工走过来说

translation.en: "Please, we cannot hear anything as we're trying to check in these people."
translation.zh: “拜托太吵了 我们要帮这些人办理入住 什么都听不到”

translation.en: And so we would lower the music.
translation.zh: 我们就会调低音量

translation.en: After five minutes, Billy would come back.
translation.zh: 然后五分钟后 比利就会回来说

translation.en: "Raise the music."
translation.zh: “把音量调高”

translation.en: Everyone was, like, arguing, you know?
translation.zh: 所有人都在争吵

translation.en: Everyone was making noise or like, "Where I'm gonna stay?
translation.zh: 每个人都在说：“我要住在哪里？

translation.en: What am I gonna do? What am I gonna eat?"
translation.zh: 我要做什么？吃什么？”

translation.en: The attendees were looking towards anything, anyone for direction.
translation.zh: 参与者们想找任何人了解状况

translation.en: Guys, stay here.
translation.zh: 各位 别动

translation.en: [Seth] Billy McFarland stood up on a table.
translation.zh: 比利麦克法兰德站在桌上

translation.en: So I just kind of walked up and I said, "Where do you go if you have a villa?"
translation.zh: 我走过去说“订了别墅的去哪里住？”

translation.en: And he said, "Everybody that has a villa, just go grab a tent."
translation.zh: 他说：“所有订了别墅的人都去找个帐篷住吧”

translation.en: And so this whole mass of people...
translation.zh: 所以这么一大群人

translation.en: I was like, "It's a free-for-all."
translation.zh: 进入了混战模式

translation.en: [Justin] Everybody started sprinting, running to their tents, grabbing bags.
translation.zh: 所有人都开始小跑 跑向帐篷抓着行李

translation.en: [Mark] We heard this voice,
translation.zh: 我们听到了声音

translation.en: we heard this rush, then we heard the screaming.
translation.zh: 听到了奔跑 听到有人尖叫

translation.en: We walked out and there was just this mass of people going to tents.
translation.zh: 我们走出去看到一大群人跑着去占帐篷

translation.en: [CC] It's an absolute circus. I don't know what's going on.
translation.zh: 整个像马戏团一样我不知道发生了什么

translation.en: I'm not getting off this ship until I know what's going on there.
translation.zh: 我得先搞清楚状况再行动

translation.en: [woman] It's 8:36 and people are now just getting their luggage.
translation.zh: 现在是8点36分  人们刚刚拿到行李

translation.en: These are the lockers that are just being set up.
translation.zh: 这些是刚设立起来的行李柜

translation.en: They're taking off the plastic that are supposed to hold our valuables.
translation.zh: 他们扯下了用来保护我们贵重物品的塑料膜

translation.en: [Justin] There was no one who planned out luggage tags.
translation.zh: 没有人安排行李标签

translation.en: They brought out the luggage in two big containers.
translation.zh: 就用两个大集装箱把我们所有的行李都拿了出来

translation.en: Like truck containers. Eighteen-wheeler containers.
translation.zh: 就是18轮大卡车的集装箱

translation.en: They just said, "Everyone, grab your bag." And it was just a frenzy.
translation.zh: 然后说：“大家拿自己的行李吧”一片混乱

translation.en: [Marc C.] Everyone was just looking for, you know,
translation.zh: 大家都在一大批黑色的箱子里

translation.en: their black bag amongst a sea of black bags.
translation.zh: 找自己的黑色箱子

translation.en: And if they had to climb over you
translation.zh: 即使他们得从你身上爬过去

translation.en: and stomp over you to get their piece of luggage, so be it.
translation.zh: 拿自己的行李 也在所不惜

translation.en: This is an absolute disaster.
translation.zh: 这完全是一场灾难

translation.en: Where do you-- Yo!
translation.zh: 你去哪里…喂！

translation.en: We do not want to be on the perimeter, I promise you.
translation.zh: 我们也不想靠近你们 我发誓

translation.en: [Justin] We didn't want neighbors.
translation.zh: 我们不想要有邻居

translation.en: Our strategy from there was to kind of ransack
translation.zh: 我们的策略就是洗劫

translation.en: all the tents around us.
translation.zh: 周围所有的帐篷

translation.en: Just started poking holes and flipping mattresses.
translation.zh: 开始挖洞、把床垫给翻下来

translation.en: My buddy pissed on a few of the beds.
translation.zh: 我的朋友在几个床上撒了尿

translation.en: [Columbo] Shit got crazy.
translation.zh: 疯狂透顶

translation.en: People was just walking with mattresses on top of their head.
translation.zh: 人们扛着床垫走

translation.en: Walking from this one around to that one.
translation.zh: 从一个帐篷走向另一个帐篷

translation.en: [Marc C.] It became this looting mentality.
translation.zh: 出现了打劫的心理

translation.en: One woman had a whole pallet of toilet paper.
translation.zh: 一个女人拿了一大盘厕纸

translation.en: Somebody else had this whole giant box of pillows
translation.zh: 一个人拿了一大箱枕头

translation.en: that she was lugging back to her tent.
translation.zh: 拖往自己的帐篷里

translation.en: It became very barbaric, in a sense.
translation.zh: 某种意义上说 变得非常野蛮

translation.en: [Mark] Driving around, it was the most eerie feeling in the world.
translation.zh: 在附近开车简直是全世界最怪异的体验

translation.en: There was no lights.
translation.zh: 没有路灯

translation.en: [Mick] It looked like a horror scene.
translation.zh: 感觉像是个恐怖片

translation.en: People were scattered throughout that area and spent one night.
translation.zh: 人们分散在四周过夜

translation.en: My guess is most of them never went to sleep.
translation.zh: 我猜大部分人都没睡着

translation.en: [Mark C.] Some woman came in
translation.zh: 深更半夜 一个女人

translation.en: in a panic at one point in the dead of night.
translation.zh: 突然闯了进来 神色恐慌

translation.en: She couldn't find her friend.
translation.zh: 她找不到自己的朋友了

translation.en: She was lost, she seemed like she was drunk. I mean...
translation.zh: 她迷路了 看起来喝醉了酒

translation.en: But there's nothing you can do to help a person like that.
translation.zh: 但你也没办法帮她

translation.en: You know, I don't know where I am either.
translation.zh: 我也不知道自己在哪里

translation.en: And there was a definite turning point, I would say,
translation.zh: 我觉得在太阳落山后

translation.en: when the sun went down,
translation.zh: 出现了转折点

translation.en: when the camaraderie was over.
translation.zh: 同志情谊结束了

translation.en: [Mark] All I know is that, by the end of the night,
translation.zh: 我只知道当天晚上

translation.en: all of the tents were full.
translation.zh: 所有帐篷都住满了

translation.en: And this is with one-third of the guests we were supposed to have.
translation.zh: 而这只是我们所有客人的三分之一

translation.en: [Mick] I remember just leaving this place
translation.zh: 我记得开车离开的时候

translation.en: and looking at this image of the campground
translation.zh: 看着这个营地的画面

translation.en: for the first time feeling what an epic failure really is.
translation.zh: 人生中第一次感受到什么叫做史诗级别的失败

translation.en: [Seth] So, as I was tweeting about the event,
translation.zh: （没人知道去哪里 没有别墅一个灾难性的帐篷城市）

translation.en: just to be like, "This is what's going on."
translation.zh: 说出了：“事实是这样的”

translation.en: I mean, "Here's the lockers, here's the concierge stand.
translation.zh: 拍照发布说：“这就是行李柜这就是礼宾台

translation.en: This is what Fyre Festival is."
translation.zh: 这就是FYRE音乐节了”

translation.en: The tweets just started going viral.
translation.zh: 我的推特开始被疯狂转发

translation.en: It was just kind of the perfect thing to consume in real-time.
translation.zh: 很适合实时传播实况

translation.en: Then I saw the Twitter post.
translation.zh: 然后我看到了那个推特

translation.en: The cheese sandwich.
translation.zh: 芝士三明治

translation.en: That was when I knew this was done.
translation.zh: 当时我就知道我们完蛋了

translation.en: I remember The New York Times came out with an article
translation.zh: （转发 赞） 我记得《纽约时报》发了一篇文章

translation.en: that talked about this entire Fyre Festival.
translation.zh: 谈了整个FYRE音乐节

translation.en: [Mick] They talked about it very matter-of-fact,
translation.zh: 非常认真地从运营角度

translation.en: from an operational perspective.
translation.zh: 进行了讨论

translation.en: What they didn't talk about, which I think was something that was missed,
translation.zh: 他们没有讨论到的一点我觉得他们遗漏的一点是

translation.en: was a couple of powerful models posting an orange tile
translation.zh: 这个音乐节是由几个大红大紫的模特发布了橙色色块的新鲜事

translation.en: is what essentially built this entire festival,
translation.zh: 所搭建起来的

translation.en: and then one kid with probably 400 followers
translation.zh: 而一个只有四百多个粉丝的人

translation.en: posted a picture of cheese on toast
translation.zh: 在推特上发布了芝士面包的照片

translation.en: that trended and essentially ripped down the festival.
translation.zh: 被疯狂转发 导致了音乐节垮台

translation.en: All I know is that people were stoked to watch this thing go down.
translation.zh: 我只知道人们看着这个音乐节垮台非常兴奋

translation.en: [Gabrielle] There definitely was kind of like
translation.zh: 社交媒体上绝对是出现了

translation.en: almost a gleeful response on social media
translation.zh: 幸灾乐祸的反馈

translation.en: from people that weren't there.
translation.zh: 来自没有参与的人

translation.en: The way that it seemed like it happened is funny, you know?
translation.zh: 这件事真的发生了感觉的确很有趣

translation.en: A Lord of the Flies situation with, you know, Instagram's top influencers.
translation.zh: 《蝇王》一般的情景还包括Instagram的头号网红们

translation.en: [Mick] Grant was still calling orders and asking us to do things.
translation.zh: 格兰特还在下命令叫我们做事

translation.en: I said, "No, Grant, we're not posting any more promises.
translation.zh: 我说：“不 格兰特我们不会再发布任何承诺了

translation.en: We're not trying to propel this vision any further."
translation.zh: 不会再试图推进这个愿景了”

translation.en: You know, "This thing is dead."
translation.zh: “这个音乐节已经没救了”

translation.en: Then I think, like, three minutes later, I get a text from Grant
translation.zh: 三分钟后格兰特给我发信息

translation.en: introducing me to their new social media team.
translation.zh: 介绍我认识了新的社交媒体团队

translation.en: "Can you please send him over the credentials?"
translation.zh: “请把账户密码告诉他好吗？”

translation.en: I just remember calling Ja - he wasn't even there yet -
translation.zh: 我记得给杰鲁打电话他还没到现场

translation.en: and saying, like, "There's, like, no way this is happening.
translation.zh: 我说：“音乐节不可能举行了

translation.en: I'm sending out the email. I really don't care at this point."
translation.zh: 我现在就发邮件 我已经不在乎了”

translation.en: And then I told Billy I cancelled the acts
translation.zh: 然后我告诉比利说我把聘请演出的艺人都取消了

translation.en: and at that point, he knew everything had fallen apart already.
translation.zh: 那一刻他知道一切都土崩瓦解了

translation.en: And he was pacing back and forth out on the terrace.
translation.zh: 他在露台上来回踱步

translation.en: I could see that there were tears in his eyes,
translation.zh: 能看到他眼中带泪

translation.en: but that was the first time that any of us had seen that.
translation.zh: 这是我们所有人第一次见到他流泪

translation.en: Through thick and thin,
translation.zh: 不管遇上什么困难

translation.en: he stayed so positive and it wasn't until that day...
translation.zh: 他都保持乐观 直到那一天

translation.en: that things started to crumble, that he really started to get it.
translation.zh: 情况开始崩溃 他才开始明白

translation.en: [Mick] I mean, he went from, two days before,
translation.zh: 他从两天前

translation.en: thinking he was the entrepreneur of our decade
translation.zh: 那个近十年来最伟大的企业家

translation.en: to essentially being a massive viral disgrace and joke.
translation.zh: 成为了一个被疯狂传播的巨大的笑话和耻辱

translation.en: [Marc] I go into the production house, and, like, Grant's crying
translation.zh: 我去制作屋看到格兰特在哭泣

translation.en: and Carola just looks like she's been like hit by a truck.
translation.zh: 卡罗拉看起来像是被卡车撞了

translation.en: Grant stayed and he was talking about drafting up their official response
translation.zh: 格兰特还在讨论如何起草官方的事件回应

translation.en: to what had happened, and it was like, "Due to circumstances out of our control,"
translation.zh: 写道：“由于我们无法控制的因素”

translation.en: and I remember Jorge looks at him and he's like, "Do not lie again.
translation.zh: 我记得豪尔赫看着他说“不要再撒谎了

translation.en: This is your chance to tell the truth.
translation.zh: 这是你坦白的机会

translation.en: "Don't say 'out of our control.' This was perfectly in our control."
translation.zh: 别说我们无法控制这件事完全是在我们控制之内的”

translation.en: [James] Major update.
translation.zh: 重大更新

translation.en: Fyre Festival is officially cancelled.
translation.zh: FYRE音乐节被正式取消

translation.en: -Just got the news, guys. -[woman] Officially?
translation.zh: -刚收到新闻 各位-正式的？

translation.en: -[man] Is it really? -It's what Mick said.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-米克说的

translation.en: Apparently, there's no food on the island. They're not letting people in.
translation.zh: 岛上没有食物了 他们不放人进来了

translation.en: [Gabrielle] People who just landed here have to go back to Miami.
translation.zh: 刚抵达的人需要飞回迈阿密

translation.en: They were just trying to get out at that point.
translation.zh: 当时他们都想试着回去

translation.en: Part of the problem was that there weren't planes to take them out
translation.zh: 但问题是没有飞机搭载他们回去

translation.en: and the airport was totally overwhelmed with all these people
translation.zh: 机场里全是人

translation.en: and they eventually locked them in
translation.zh: 他们最后把这些人锁在了机场里

translation.en: and kept them overnight without any food or water.♪
translation.zh: 让他们待了一晚上 没有水 没有食物

translation.en: Okay. How long until water comes?
translation.zh: 还有多久才会有水？

translation.en: And food.
translation.zh: 还有食物

translation.en: [man] When do we get our money back?
translation.zh: 什么时候能拿到退款？

translation.en: It was just this sort of real-time saga
translation.zh: 实时的现场描述是从

translation.en: that started at six o'clock in the afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午6点开始的

translation.en: And in the morning, the media started picking it up.
translation.zh: 第二天早上 媒体开始报道

translation.en: [reporter 1] This morning, the organizers of the failed Fyre Festival
translation.zh: 今天早上 失败的FYRE音乐节组织者

translation.en: are feeling the heat.
translation.zh: 开始感受到了压力

translation.en: We took a big jump here, a big risk,
translation.zh: 我们冒了很大的风险

translation.en: and V1 has failed.
translation.zh: 第一版失败了

translation.en: People were making fun of it, making fun of us.
translation.zh: 人们开始取笑音乐节 取笑我们

translation.en: [Conan] Do you feel bad for the people that did spend money and go to this--
translation.zh: 对于真的花了钱去参加这个音乐节的人 你感到抱歉吗？

translation.en: If you had thousands of dollars to go on a trip to see Blink-182...
translation.zh: 如果你真的有几千块钱专程飞去看眨眼182

translation.en: that's on you. That is Darwinism at its finest.
translation.zh: 那是你的问题这就是达尔文主义最好的体现

translation.en: [Luca] At that point, all of their promises started to collapse,
translation.zh: 当时他们所有的承诺都开始崩塌

translation.en: so the car rental companies came and took the keys,
translation.zh: 租车公司来把钥匙拿了回去

translation.en: the house owners came and demanded that their properties were returned.
translation.zh: 房主来要求把房子还给他们

translation.en: [Andy] One of my head construction guys came to me and said, "Andy,
translation.zh: 一个建筑合同工负责人过来和我说：“安迪

translation.en: I need $26,000 in cash,
translation.zh: 我需要2.6万美元现金

translation.en: and I want it right now."
translation.zh: 我现在就要拿到”

translation.en: He was a big guy and he followed me.
translation.zh: 他块头很大 他跟着我

translation.en: And then I went back to the tent and he followed me.
translation.zh: 我回到帐篷营地 他也跟着我

translation.en: I had the head of the Bahamian Tourism Board,
translation.zh: 巴哈马群岛旅游董事会

translation.en: the Minister of Finance
translation.zh: 财政部长

translation.en: and the head of the University of the Bahamas
translation.zh: 以及巴哈马大学的校长

translation.en: waiting for $1 million that they wanted to be paid.
translation.zh: 都等着要支付给他们的一百万美元

translation.en: [Luca] There was a huge workforce of people that had been working under the sun
translation.zh: 有很多人在骄阳下赶工了

translation.en: for, you know, a month, a month-and-a-half without being paid...
translation.zh: 一个月、一个半月的时间没有拿到工钱

translation.en: that as soon as realized that, you know,
translation.zh: 一旦他们意识到

translation.en: all of this was collapsing,
translation.zh: 这一切都失败了

translation.en: started, rightfully so, demanding their payment,
translation.zh: 就开始要求拿工钱 这很合理

translation.en: so there was a sort of a strike.
translation.zh: 于是出现了罢工

translation.en: And we get word that there's an angry mob of locals
translation.zh: 我们听说有一些当地的暴徒

translation.en: coming down through the gates.
translation.zh: 从门口进来了

translation.en: They're pissed off and they want their money.
translation.zh: 他们很生气 想拿到工钱

translation.en: And it's now, like, five of us in the production house
translation.zh: 制作屋里有我们五个人

translation.en: There was about,
translation.zh: 大约有

translation.en: I don't know, I want to say 30 people coming down.
translation.zh: 我不知道 30个人走过来

translation.en: And Billy is nowhere to be seen.
translation.zh: 到处都找不到比利

translation.en: There were constant rumors flying around of where Billy was.
translation.zh: 到处有谣言说比利到底在哪里

translation.en: He was like Dr. Evil. It was like, "Billy's on a yacht."
translation.zh: 他就像邪恶博士有人说：“比利在游艇上”

translation.en: "Billy's been at the Grand Isle the whole time."
translation.zh: “比利一直都在格兰德艾尔”

translation.en: "Billy's in Miami." "Billy's in jail."
translation.zh: “比利在迈阿密” “比利进监狱了”

translation.en: Like, everyone was kind of like guessing where Billy was.
translation.zh: 所有人都在猜比利去了哪儿

translation.en: I didn't even know where Billy went.
translation.zh: 我都不知道比利去哪里了

translation.en: I went to the house and it was, like, literally cleaned out,
translation.zh: 我去了他家 整个都清空了

translation.en: and I was like, "Yo, where's Billy?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“哎呀 比利去哪儿了？”

translation.en: [Martin] After the locals realized they weren't going to get paid,
translation.zh: 当地人意识到自己拿不到工钱时

translation.en: some of them started putting hits out on people,
translation.zh: 有些人就开始动手了

translation.en: either to take them hostage and then get ransom
translation.zh: 要么是绑架 然后得到赎金

translation.en: or just to hurt and injure.
translation.zh: 要么就只是为了伤害人

translation.en: The management team looked left and right
translation.zh: 管理团队开始小心翼翼

translation.en: and suddenly it was sort of... The "save yourself" mode kicked in.
translation.zh: 然后突然“自救”情绪就开始高涨起来

translation.en: And I literally traded clothes
translation.zh: 我当时真的和一个跟我共事的

translation.en: with one of the employees that had been working with me
translation.zh: 员工交换了衣服

translation.en: and I hid behind a urinal.
translation.zh: 躲在一个小便池后面

translation.en: Someone pulled up in an old car,
translation.zh: 有人开了一辆旧车出来

translation.en: I jumped into the back and lay down on the back seat
translation.zh: 我跳上车 躺在后座上

translation.en: so I could at least get out of the village.
translation.zh: 至少从村里逃了出来

translation.en: Because I couldn't play Mother Teresa.
translation.zh: 因为我不能扮演特蕾莎修女的角色

translation.en: I couldn't fix this problem.
translation.zh: 我无法解决这个问题

translation.en: But I needed to go somewhere and find safety.
translation.zh: 但我需要去一个别的地方寻求安全

translation.en: When they realized this thing came to an abrupt stop,
translation.zh: 当他们意识到这个音乐节突然停止时

translation.en: they all leave those rent-a-cars running
translation.zh: 他们都坐上了那些租来的车

translation.en: with the keys in the ignition.
translation.zh: 车钥匙都没拔过

translation.en: I talked to one guy who said the door couldn't get open,
translation.zh: 有个人和我说车门打不开

translation.en: so a lady kicked the door and ran to the airplane.
translation.zh: 一个女士踢开了车门 跑去了机场

translation.en: So they knew that trouble was ahead.
translation.zh: 他们知道麻烦来了

translation.en: People started to come to me
translation.zh: 人们开始来找我

translation.en: for, like, money. Like...
translation.zh: 找我要钱 他们说

translation.en: "You owe us.
translation.zh: “你欠我们钱

translation.en: Where's the money?"
translation.zh: 钱呢？”

translation.en: "I don't know, but they're gone. I don't know what to do."
translation.zh: “我不知道 他们走了我不知道怎么办了”

translation.en: I called Billy, I was talking to Billy. Billy said, "Don't worry, I'll handle it."
translation.zh: 我给比利打电话 比利说“别担心 我会处理的”

translation.en: Day after day passed. You know, people were pulling up to my house.
translation.zh: 一天天过去了 人们在我家围堵

translation.en: I just leave it alone, 'cause it really pains me
translation.zh: 我得忘掉这件事 因为谈起来

translation.en: when I have to talk about it so I just wipe it away.
translation.zh: 就很心痛 我必须忘掉它

translation.en: [woman] Are you sorry?
translation.zh: 你抱歉吗？

translation.en: Thank you, guys. I'll arrange a comment later. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们 我待会儿置评 谢谢

translation.en: [reporter] He was released on Saturday on $300,000 bail.
translation.zh: 他于周六被保释保释金是三十万美元

translation.en: He claims he is broke.
translation.zh: 他称自己已破产

translation.en: He has apparently moved back in with his parents.
translation.zh: 很明显已经搬回父母家居住

translation.en: Fortunately, I think Billy is currently living in the basement
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我认为比利现在居住在他父母

translation.en: of his parents' New Jersey home.
translation.zh: 位于新泽西的家的地下室里

translation.en: He's no longer in his penthouse.
translation.zh: 他不住在顶层公寓里了

translation.en: He's no longer riding around in Maseratis
translation.zh: 也不再坐玛莎拉蒂了

translation.en: and flaunting the wealth that he stole.
translation.zh: 炫耀他偷来的财富了

translation.en: Coming back to the Fyre Festival for a second.
translation.zh: 我们先说回FYRE音乐节

translation.en: You should make a Fyre Festival game, dude.
translation.zh: 我们应该出一款FYRE音乐节的游戏 老兄

translation.en: 'Cause you're going through--
translation.zh: 因为你在经历…

translation.en: They did the Fyre Festival on Saturday Night Live.
translation.zh: 《周六夜现场》都做了FYRE音乐节相关的段子

translation.en: I know!
translation.zh: 我知道！

translation.en: You could turn this into so much.
translation.zh: 你可以把这个做出大花样

translation.en: You just gotta accept the Fyre Festival,
translation.zh: 只需要接受FYRE音乐节失败了

translation.en: and you could turn this shit into gold, like, a pot of gold and then run with it.
translation.zh: 可以将这些麻烦转变成赚钱的机会这里面有很大的商机

translation.en: I'm not allowed.
translation.zh: 他们不准我这样做

translation.en: -Wait, really? -Angelo, help me.
translation.zh: -慢着 真的吗？-安琪罗 帮帮我

translation.en: Wait, why aren't you--
translation.zh: 慢着 你为什么…

translation.en: I hadn't spoken to Billy since he was...
translation.zh: 自从比利被捕又被保释之后

translation.en: arrested and released on bail.
translation.zh: 我还没有和他说过话

translation.en: So he asked us to come down
translation.zh: 所以他叫我们去

translation.en: to this hotel where he was staying at,
translation.zh: 他住的酒店

translation.en: and he asked us if we could bring our video equipment,
translation.zh: 然后问我们能不能带上录像设备

translation.en: we can do all of that stuff.
translation.zh: 能不能去录像

translation.en: And we didn't really know what we were gonna be filming.
translation.zh: 我们并不知道要拍摄什么

translation.en: Yeah, just film around the clock.
translation.zh: 就一直拍就行

translation.en: The one thing I've learned from this is the more footage, the better.
translation.zh: 我这次汲取的经验是录像拍得越多越好

translation.en: [interviewer] How was he living while he was out on bail?
translation.zh: 他保释之后的生活是什么样的？

translation.en: He wasn't living like me.
translation.zh: 他和我的生活可不同

translation.en: Billy was living... He was living large.
translation.zh: 他生活得很铺张

translation.en: That penthouse was beautiful.
translation.zh: 那个顶层公寓很漂亮

translation.en: I just had a little bit of a confused face.
translation.zh: 我露出了一丝疑惑的表情

translation.en: Like, "How are you able to pay for all of this?"
translation.zh: 心想：“你怎么付得起这些的？”

translation.en: There was a guy named Angelo.
translation.zh: 有个叫安琪罗的家伙

translation.en: And I don't know if it was Billy's PR guy,
translation.zh: 我不知道他是不是比利的公关

translation.en: but I know that this guy was very connected.
translation.zh: 但我知道这个人的人脉很广

translation.en: That is the...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: Just try to keep me out of your stuff because my...
translation.zh: 试着让我远离你的事 因为…

translation.en: I can't say anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都不能说

translation.en: We're not saying anything bad. You can talk.
translation.zh: 我们没有说坏话 你可以说的

translation.en: You know, you can give me advice.
translation.zh: 你可以给我提建议

translation.en: We talked about my experiences
translation.zh: 我们谈到了我本人

translation.en: in the legal system
translation.zh: 在法律体系中的经历

translation.en: and I'll never forget what he said to me.
translation.zh: 我永远都忘不了他对我说了什么

translation.en: He looked me dead in my face and said,
translation.zh: 他直直盯着我的眼睛 说

translation.en: "I'm not going to jail."
translation.zh: “我不会去坐牢的”

translation.en: Well, I was like, "This man either knows something that I don't
translation.zh: 我心想：“这个人要么是知道一些我不知道的东西

translation.en: or he is certifiably insane."
translation.zh: 要么就是真的疯子”

translation.en: NYC VIP Access
translation.zh: 纽约VIP访问

translation.en: was a company that reached out to me
translation.zh: 是和我联系的一个公司

translation.en: December 15th, 2017...
translation.zh: 在2017年12月15日和我联系的

translation.en: with an offer to the 2018 Masters tournament.
translation.zh: 邀请我参加2018年美国名人赛

translation.en: It was from a guy named Frank.
translation.zh: 邮件是一个叫弗兰克的人发的

translation.en: It just said, "Hey, we've got these tickets
translation.zh: 邮件写道“我们有2018美国名人赛的门票

translation.en: to the 2018 Masters. It'd be great for you or your clients.
translation.zh: 很适合你或是你的客户

translation.en: Let us know if you want."
translation.zh: 如果有需要 请告诉我们”

translation.en: And so I texted my friend Morgan, "Did you guys get this Masters email?"
translation.zh: 于是我给我的朋友摩根发短信问“你们收到这个名人赛邮件了吗？”

translation.en: "Yeah. I got that too."
translation.zh: “我也收到了”

translation.en: And so I'm like, okay, clearly
translation.zh: 于是我就知道了 很明显

translation.en: somebody's targeting the Fyre Festival email list.
translation.zh: 有人针对了FYRE音乐节的邮件名单

translation.en: December 19th, "Gift the gift of private flights."
translation.zh: 12月19号“送出私人飞行大礼”

translation.en: December 21st, again from NYC VIP Access,
translation.zh: 12月21号 又是美国名人赛的纽约VIP访问

translation.en: "Coachella 2018 VIP passes for $500.
translation.zh: “2018年科切拉音乐节VIP通行证 售价五百美元

translation.en: "Please email me or call phone number to reserve. Frank."
translation.zh: 请回邮件或打电话以预约 弗兰克”

translation.en: January 2nd,
translation.zh: 1月2日

translation.en: "Meet Ed Sheeran, Demi Lovato, DJ Khaled, Taylor Swift and more.
translation.zh: “亲眼见艾德希兰、黛米洛瓦托DJ哈立德和泰勒斯威夫特等

translation.en: We want to one-up your New Year's resolutions
translation.zh: 我们想一次性实现你的新年决心

translation.en: by making your dreams become a reality.
translation.zh: 让你梦想成真

translation.en: Please email or call to reserve. Frank."
translation.zh: 请回邮件或打电话预订 弗兰克”

translation.en: "Burning Man, 2018."
translation.zh: 2018火人节

translation.en: "Courtside at MSG
translation.zh: 麦迪逊花园球场前排座位

translation.en: and dinner with LeBron."
translation.zh: 和勒布朗詹姆斯共进晚餐

translation.en: "Victoria Secret Fashion Show," "Met Gala,
translation.zh: 维多利亚秘密秀大都会艺术博物馆慈善晚宴红毯

translation.en: red carpet and gala tickets.
translation.zh: 和晚宴票

translation.en: Please email, text or call me to reserve.
translation.zh: 请回邮件、发短信或打电话预订

translation.en: First come, first serve. Frank."
translation.zh: 先到先得 弗兰克”

translation.en: So we're basically
translation.zh: 我们开始卖

translation.en: selling 2018 Grammy tickets. VIP Access, baby.
translation.zh: 2018年格莱美奖门票 提供VIP访问

translation.en: What's the next number?
translation.zh: 下一个号码是什么？

translation.en: [Gabrielle] I first started hearing about the NYC VIP Access emails
translation.zh: 我第一次听说纽约VIP访问邮件

translation.en: in December.
translation.zh: 是在12月

translation.en: When I realized that multiple people who had attended the festival
translation.zh: 我发现有好多参与了音乐节的人

translation.en: were getting the emails,
translation.zh: 收到了邮件

translation.en: that was when I really started to look at it more seriously.
translation.zh: 所以我就进行了深入的调查

translation.en: Met Gala tickets can't be purchased
translation.zh: 大都会艺术博物馆慈善晚宴门票是不能买的

translation.en: and anyone who attends has to be approved by Anna Wintour in advance.
translation.zh: 所有参加的人都需要事先获得安娜温特的批准

translation.en: The Victoria's Secret Show hadn't even been cast yet.
translation.zh: 而维多利亚秘密秀还没有开始筹备

translation.en: Taylor Swift, she's very open about the fact
translation.zh: 泰勒斯威夫特曾非常公开地表示

translation.en: that she doesn't do meet-and-greets.
translation.zh: 她不做私人的见面活动

translation.en: Burning Man told me that they had not sold any tickets
translation.zh: 而火人节表示他们还没有开始卖票

translation.en: and that there were no sponsors who would have tickets available.
translation.zh: 不可能有赞助商有票

translation.en: Pretty much everything that they offered was debunked
translation.zh: 他们提供的一切几乎都很容易

translation.en: through just a quick phone call or a Google search.
translation.zh: 用一个电话或谷歌搜索揭穿

translation.en: That's fucking hustling right here.
translation.zh: 这可真他妈是个骗子

translation.en: The first time I met Frank Tribble
translation.zh: 我第一次是在酒店

translation.en: was at the hotel.
translation.zh: 认识小弗兰克崔波的

translation.en: I had never seen him before
translation.zh: 我之前从来没见过他

translation.en: and usually the people who are around Billy, I'm familiar with.
translation.zh: 通常比利周围的人我都挺熟悉的

translation.en: The strangest thing was he actually had on a Magnises hat,
translation.zh: 最奇怪的事情是他真的戴了麦格尼西斯帽子

translation.en: he had on, like, a Fyre sweater.
translation.zh: 穿了FYRE的毛衣

translation.en: Frank is, I think, 22 or 23, and Billy had reached out to him
translation.zh: 我觉得弗兰克大约22到23岁比利联系到他

translation.en: and said, "I'm starting this company,
translation.zh: 和他说：“我要办一家公司

translation.en: but I'm kind of in some hot water related to Fyre Festival,
translation.zh: 但我现在因为FYRE音乐节的事情处境有些麻烦

translation.en: so I need you to be the face of it."
translation.zh: 所以我需要你做公司的代表”

translation.en: Hi, is this Zachary?
translation.zh: 喂 是扎克利吗？

translation.en: Zachary, this is Frank calling from NYC VIP Access.
translation.zh: 扎克利 我是弗兰克是从纽约VIP访问打来的

translation.en: The reason I was actually giving you a call,
translation.zh: 我给你打电话是因为

translation.en: the Grammys are gonna be held in New York City on Sunday January 28th,
translation.zh: 格莱美奖会在1月28日周日那天在纽约举行

translation.en: in Madison Square Garden,
translation.zh: 就在麦迪逊花园球场

translation.en: and we're actually selling VIP tickets for that event.
translation.zh: 我们在卖该活动的VIP票

translation.en: According to the FBI, 15 people gave him
translation.zh: 据联邦调查局说 有15个人

translation.en: over $100,000 for those tickets.
translation.zh: 给了他超过十万美元买票

translation.en: Josh, Frank is gonna call off the list.
translation.zh: 乔石 弗兰克会把名单上的电话都打一遍

translation.en: If they don't pick up, you send them an email.
translation.zh: 如果他们不接电话你就给他们发邮件

translation.en: I'll write a script for you right now, okay?
translation.zh: 我现在就给你写邮件模板 好吗？

translation.en: What are you recording?
translation.zh: 你在录什么？

translation.en: It's hard for me to say if these guys didn't know what was going on.
translation.zh: 我不能很明确地说这些人不知道发生了什么

translation.en: But I also know that Billy is really good at keeping a level of information...
translation.zh: 但我也知道比利非常擅长将部分信息公开

translation.en: below and above.
translation.zh: 部分隐藏

translation.en: For every call, call twice in a row if they don't pick up.
translation.zh: 每个电话都连打两次如果没人接的话

translation.en: Everybody picks up on the second ring.
translation.zh: 每个人接到第二个电话时都会接听

translation.en: Let's cut for now. Thanks.
translation.zh: 可以卡了

translation.en: On June 12th, I published an article
translation.zh: 6月12日 我发表了一篇文章

translation.en: outlining all the crossover between Billy McFarland
translation.zh: 概述了比利麦克法兰德和纽约VIP访问之间

translation.en: and New York City VIP Access,
translation.zh: 所有的联系

translation.en: and about six hours later
translation.zh: 大约六个小时后

translation.en: Billy was rearrested and charged with five felonies.
translation.zh: 比利重新被捕 被指控五项重罪

translation.en: They included fraud, money laundering,
translation.zh: 包括诈骗、洗钱

translation.en: identity theft, and witness intimidation
translation.zh: 身份盗窃、证人恐吓

translation.en: after he warned at least two people not to talk to the FBI
translation.zh: 他警告了至少两个人不要和联邦调查局的人交谈

translation.en: and to pretend that they were represented by legal counsel
translation.zh: 并假装他们有律师代表

translation.en: when they were not.
translation.zh: 其实没有

translation.en: I mean, the idea of him doing this
translation.zh: 他保释期间还在做这些

translation.en: while he's out on bail is mind-blowing to me.
translation.zh: 这件事让我印象深刻

translation.en: Because you're already under the biggest microscope,
translation.zh: 因为你已经在接受最严格的监察了

translation.en: and then you're gonna go and commit another scam.
translation.zh: 居然还要再进行诈骗

translation.en: Like, I just don't understand why he didn't just stop.
translation.zh: 我不明白他为什么不停手

translation.en: [Interviewer] You said Billy asked you about going, what...
translation.zh: 你说比利问过你…

translation.en: What was he asking you about jail?
translation.zh: 他问了你哪些关于监狱的事？

translation.en: Well, unfortunately, I had a misstep in my past,
translation.zh: 很不幸的是 我过去曾经失足

translation.en: and, um...
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: I unfortunately experienced it.
translation.zh: 我不幸曾有过坐牢的经历

translation.en: And I was in there for two months.
translation.zh: 我坐了两个月的牢

translation.en: And, you know, he just flat out asked me. He was like, "What was it like?"
translation.zh: 他就直接问我说“坐牢是什么样的？”

translation.en: And I was like, "It's 23/1 for the first seven days."
translation.zh: 我说：“前七天是23/1”

translation.en: He was like, "What's 23/1?"
translation.zh: 他问我：“什么是23/1？”

translation.en: "You're in a fucking cell for 23 hours.
translation.zh: “你在牢房里待23个小时

translation.en: And then they let you out for one.
translation.zh: 然后放你出来一个小时

translation.en: You better stretch your legs, walk around,
translation.zh: 最好拉伸一下 走一走

translation.en: do whatever you need to do, but you're in there
translation.zh: 做你需要做的事 但还是得待在里面

translation.en: until you're processed. After that, they put you where they need to put you,
translation.zh: 直到被处理然后他们会给你安排监狱

translation.en: until you get sent up north."
translation.zh: 送你去监狱”

translation.en: And I remember the energy off of him. And it was just like...
translation.zh: 我记得他当时精神萎靡了

translation.en: That shit was so far away from what he knew
translation.zh: 坐牢离他所知道的

translation.en: and what he experienced in his life,
translation.zh: 所体验过的生活太过遥远

translation.en: that the cognitive dissonance just led him to say,
translation.zh: 以至于认知失调让他直接说道

translation.en: "I'm not going to jail."
translation.zh: “我不会坐牢的”

translation.en: [Marc] I reflected on myself
translation.zh: 我自己反思了

translation.en: and I was questioning to what extent was I guilty,
translation.zh: 质疑我有的罪责有多少

translation.en: to what extent was I complicit in all of this.
translation.zh: 在多大程度上是从犯

translation.en: And I looked back at my posts on social media
translation.zh: 我回看了我社交媒体上发布的内容

translation.en: and it was like all beautiful beaches and sunsets.
translation.zh: 都是漂亮的海滩和日落

translation.en: You know? And...
translation.zh: 但是

translation.en: And I was going through the hardest experience of my life,
translation.zh: 我却在经历着人生最困难的经历

translation.en: and yet if you had seen it, you'd have been like,
translation.zh: 但如果你看到我发布的内容你会觉得

translation.en: "Wow, what a great life this guy leads.
translation.zh: “这个人的生活多美好

translation.en: He's living in the Bahamas, going to beaches all day."
translation.zh: 他住在巴哈马群岛每天都可以去海滩”

translation.en: And Fyre shows what happens when you take that to an extreme.
translation.zh: FYRE证明了过于极端地相信这些会发生什么

translation.en: I've said this multiple times - the real Fyre Festival happened twice.
translation.zh: 我已经说过几次了真正的FYRE音乐节发生过两次

translation.en: It was the shoots.
translation.zh: 就是拍宣传片的时候

translation.en: What the commercial was was what everybody wanted.
translation.zh: 宣传片就是所有人想要的

translation.en: The shoots were parties.
translation.zh: 宣传片拍摄过程就是派对

translation.en: It just happened to happen for 60 people versus 6,000.
translation.zh: 只不过是60人的派对 而不是六千人

translation.en: [J.R.] It was epic.
translation.zh: 非常壮观

translation.en: It was nothing I never saw before in my whole entire life. Like...
translation.zh: 是我这辈子从来没见过的

translation.en: I'm from the Bahamas, man. We're used to small island stuff.
translation.zh: 我是巴哈马人 我们习惯了小岛生活

translation.en: That was like... That put me up on a new level, a higher level.
translation.zh: 而那个 让我上升了一个层次

translation.en: [Jillionaire] We're living in this influencers society, you know?
translation.zh: 我们生活在网红的世界里

translation.en: Everybody wants to have this online clout,
translation.zh: 每个人都希望在网上有影响力

translation.en: people want to have access
translation.zh: 人们想要有访问权

translation.en: and they want exclusivity.
translation.zh: 想要独占

translation.en: Fyre was basically, like, Instagram coming to life.
translation.zh: FYRE基本上就像是Instagram成真了

translation.en: It actually dovetails really interestingly with
translation.zh: 其实很有趣 音乐节

translation.en: just random news stories that have come out since.
translation.zh: 与之后的一些新闻故事吻合了

translation.en: I was reading about a company in Russia
translation.zh: 我读到一个俄罗斯公司

translation.en: that now will sell people like three hours to do a photo shoot
translation.zh: 现在出售的服务是给人们三个小时在私人飞机上拍摄

translation.en: on a private jet that's just parked on the tarmac.
translation.zh: 但飞机一直停在跑道上

translation.en: They never actually leave,
translation.zh: 并不会起飞

translation.en: but they get to take the picture looking out the window,
translation.zh: 但他们有机会在飞机上拍照从窗口往外看

translation.en: and pretending that they're living this lifestyle.
translation.zh: 假装这是他们的生活方式

translation.en: And, like, they're successful. People are using it.
translation.zh: 公司很成功 有人使用他们的服务

translation.en: Billy seemed really invested in that whole lifestyle.
translation.zh: 比利看起来非常专注于那种生活状态

translation.en: Yo, I wanna say happy birthday to my brother,
translation.zh: 我想祝我兄弟生日快乐

translation.en: my partner Billy in the building. Happy birthday, Billy.
translation.zh: 祝我的搭档比利生日快乐

translation.en: I think it was important to him not just to be on a plane with a model,
translation.zh: 我觉得这对他很重要不只是和模特一起在飞机上

translation.en: but to feel like that was his life.
translation.zh: 而且感觉到这就是他的人生

translation.en: That he belonged there. And not because he owns Fyre,
translation.zh: 他属于那里 不是因为他拥有FYRE

translation.en: but because that's who he was.
translation.zh: 而是因为他本人就是如此

translation.en: He was completely out of his depth, and he's,
translation.zh: 他完全无法胜任

translation.en: unfortunately for himself, a compulsive liar.
translation.zh: 而且很不幸的是他是个难以控制的撒谎者

translation.en: And someone that at the end, you know, should be held accountable.
translation.zh: 最终 他就是应该被问责的人

translation.en: [MDavid] He has a massive debt,
translation.zh: 他有巨大的债务

translation.en: not just to the people who invested or to the concert-goers.
translation.zh: 不仅是对投资人和音乐会参与者

translation.en: I think he has a larger debt to the employees
translation.zh: 我觉得他欠员工的更多

translation.en: that were reporting and working with him.
translation.zh: 向他报告 与他一起工作的人

translation.en: The only way, in my opinion, a guy like this learns his lesson
translation.zh: 我觉得想要这样的人吸取教训

translation.en: is actually going to jail.
translation.zh: 就必须让他坐牢

translation.en: [Calvin] I don't think that we've heard the last of Billy McFarland.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们未来还会听到比利麦克法兰德的消息

translation.en: I mean, if there's anything that guy is good at,
translation.zh: 如果他有一样擅长的事

translation.en: it's separating consumers from their cash.
translation.zh: 就是将消费者和他们的钱分离开

translation.en: And if there's anything that this country
translation.zh: 如果这个国家还有什么比那

translation.en: celebrates more than that, I don't know.
translation.zh: 更推崇的东西 我就不知道是什么了

translation.en: [Marc] Billy has a presence where, you know, there's something behind the smile.
translation.zh: 你知道比利的微笑后面藏着什么

translation.en: I wouldn't be surprised if ten years down the line,
translation.zh: 如果十年后 又听说

translation.en: we're hearing about Billy McFarland
translation.zh: 比利麦克法兰德又开创了

translation.en: starting some kind of other venture that's...
translation.zh: 另一个公司

translation.en: you know, imaginative and, uh,
translation.zh: 充满想象力、发展势头良好

translation.en: and gets some serious momentum
translation.zh: 我不会觉得奇怪

translation.en: and, you know, this all happens in some form again.

translation.en: It's Billy!
translation.zh: 是比利打来的

translation.en: What's up, Billy?
translation.zh: 你好吗 比利？

translation.en: I'm in front of the cameraman. I'm talking--
translation.zh: 我正对着摄像组呢 我在谈…

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.zh: 我很好

translation.en: Yeah. I'm putting in some good words.
translation.zh: 是的 我在帮你说好话

translation.en: You want me to say anything on the camera for you?
translation.zh: 你想让我在摄影机上帮你说点什么吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: All right. Action!
translation.zh: 好的 开拍！
